III (Three).comment: 巴西第一酒厂斯巴达克斯2021年的三周年世涛，目前喝过最好喝的甜品世涛！第一口惊艳！在两款波旁威士忌桶陈酿，倒入杯中酒体中等不稠，第一口就像是吃冰激凌一样，刚入口的甜抓住你，酒体超级顺滑，不自主的滑下喉咙，在喉咙处开始回口给你烤椰子、肉桂、咖啡、黑巧等等丰富味道体验，特别的惊喜，尤其是你并没太在意的时候，超级爽！有酒友有跟红叔同样感受，桶与酒的完美融合！红叔给满分！2023.5.14开罐饮用
III (Three).translatedComment: The 2021 third anniversary stout from Spartacus, Brazil’s number one winery, is the best dessert stout I have ever tasted! The first bite was amazing! Aged in two bourbon barrels, the wine is medium-bodied and not thick when poured into the glass. The first bite is like eating ice cream. The sweetness in your mouth grabs you. The wine is super smooth and slides down your throat involuntarily. It starts to return to your throat, giving you a rich flavor experience of toasted coconut, cinnamon, coffee, black chocolate, etc. It’s a special surprise, especially when you don’t pay much attention, it’s super refreshing! Some wine friends have the same feeling as Uncle Hong, the perfect fusion of barrel and wine! Full marks to Uncle Hong! 2023.5.14 Open the can and drink

III (Three).comment: Wat een blubberdikke mes en vork stout. Bomvol espresso karamel cappuccino geroosterde hazelnoten kokosnoot esdoornsiroop dadels pure chocolade vanilie bourbon. Wauw!
III (Three).translatedComment: What a blubbery knife and fork stout. Packed with espresso caramel cappuccino roasted hazelnuts coconut maple syrup dates dark chocolate vanilla bourbon. Wow!

III (Three).translatedComment: In the run-up to Billie's I brought back some memories and I can now say with certainty that it tastes better in the bottle than in the keg... Sweet chocolate bomb full of coconut, hazelnut and a hint of maple! What a wonderful interplay with the subtle vessel!

III (Three).translatedComment: What a perfect beer for my birthday. It's completely oily, but oh so tasty. Best beer from Spartacus yet. 🇧🇷 🍻

III (Three).comment: 深黑，无泡沫，表面析出的椰油固状物漂浮。酒体中等偏上厚度，黏稠度爆表了，同时顺滑度也很好，顶级世涛的口感有了。闻香略弱，坚果，轻微枫糖，明显甜感。前段甜感重，枫糖，烤椰子，后段一点点辛辣，肉桂的感觉在舌尖出现。回温后闻香有显著枫糖和烤椰子香气，后段桶味带来的苦感，肉桂香气越发浓郁。整体说来酒体打造非常优秀，堪称顶级，对枫糖的表现和平衡也很有水准，弱点在于初始香气不够抓人，需要回温，桶味相对也略弱。
III (Three).translatedComment: Deep black, no foam, coconut oil solids precipitated on the surface float. The wine is medium to medium-bodied and has an incredible viscosity. It is also very smooth and has the taste of a top-notch stout. The aroma is slightly weak, nutty, slightly maple syrup, obviously sweet. The front part is sweet, with maple syrup and toasted coconut, and the back part is a little spicy, with a cinnamon feeling on the tip of the tongue. After warming up, there are obvious aromas of maple sugar and toasted coconut. The bitterness brought by the barrel flavor in the later stage, and the aroma of cinnamon becomes more intense. Overall, the body of the wine is very good, it can be called top-notch, and the performance and balance of maple syrup are also very good. The weakness is that the initial aroma is not attractive enough and needs to be warmed up, and the barrel flavor is relatively weak.

III (Three).comment: Eerste 5/5. En dat op mijn verjaardag! Maar ja was ook gewoon perfect
III (Three).translatedComment: First 5/5. And that on my birthday! But yes, it was also just perfect

III (Three).comment: Mooie promotie vraagt om mooi bier. Deze geweldenaar delivers!!! Kauwen op de woensdag. Hazelnoten in een kokos jasje met een fantastische basis stout. 👍👊
III (Three).translatedComment: Great promotion requires great beer. This monster delivers!!! Chewing on Wednesday. Hazelnuts in a coconut jacket with a fantastic base stout. 👍👊

III (Three).comment: 如果能微微降低甜度那就是我的年度世涛了。
III (Three).translatedComment: If it could tone down the sweetness just a bit it would be my stout of the year.

III (Three).comment: 2021年的最后一款酒，奠定了斯巴达克斯是2021最喜欢的酒厂了刚开瓶拿出来，15度的酒体喝起来像10度，酒精感被压到若有似无，有甜品世涛的口感但又完全没有腻口，椰子榛子表现十五分钟回温后，增味变化，变成枫糖肉桂，苦味开始出来，但酒精竟然还是压的很稳再考虑到价格，给4.75不为过，牛逼！
III (Three).translatedComment: The last wine of 2021 has established that Spartacus is my favorite winery in 2021. As soon as I opened the bottle and took it out, the 15-degree wine tasted like 10 degrees, and the alcohol was suppressed to the point where it was almost non-existent. It has the texture of a dessert stout but is not greasy at all. After the coconut hazelnut warms up for fifteen minutes, the flavor changes and turns into maple syrup and cinnamon. The bitterness begins to emerge, but the alcohol is still very stable. Considering the price, 4.75 is not an exaggeration, it’s awesome!

V (Five).comment: 饮用日期：2023/9/14味道及感受：🍺香气：奶油黑巧蛋糕的甜香🍺外观：黑色酒体中等挂杯壁，有一定悬浮物🍺味道：非常具象黑巧克力蛋糕，尤其是第一口脑海里就浮现，然后是香草和椰子味道，介绍是有加伯爵茶，但可能其味道杯香草盖住了，桶的感受也微弱🍺口感：浓郁饱满，平衡顺滑，三周年＞四周年＞五周年
V (Five).translatedComment: Drinking date: 2023/9/14 Taste and feeling: 🍺 Aroma: The sweet aroma of creamy black chocolate cake 🍺 Appearance: Black medium-bodied wine hanging on the wall of the cup, with a certain amount of suspended matter 🍺 Taste: Very specific dark chocolate cake, especially the first one The taste comes to mind, and then there is the flavor of vanilla and coconut. The introduction is that Earl Gray tea is added, but maybe the vanilla cup covers the taste, and the barrel feeling is also weak🍺Taste: rich and full, balanced and smooth, third anniversary > fourth anniversary ＞Fifth anniversary

IV (Four).comment: 巴西第一酒厂斯巴达克斯2022年的四周年世涛，这两款酒是红叔宝藏库存酒款，5周年也预定了还在回来路上，如果有机会红叔再把本场酒局酒友叫回来一起品鉴5周年。这款4周年还加了埃塞的瑰夏咖啡。入口同样自然而然的顺滑，滑溜溜的就经过你的味蕾通过喉咙喝下去，会比上一款在烤椰子味道上更重一些，更加甜品世涛一些，瑰夏咖啡可能带来微微酸质但不明显，整体还是偏甜但不腻，桶与酒扔就融合的超级棒！可能上一款太惊艳了，这款分就没给满分了。2023.5.14开罐饮用
IV (Four).translatedComment: The fourth anniversary stout of Brazil's No. 1 winery Spartacus in 2022. These two wines are the wines in Uncle Hong's treasure. They are also reserved for the 5th anniversary and are on the way back. If there is a chance, Uncle Hong will make this wine again. The drinking buddies from the bureau were invited back to taste the 5th anniversary together. This 4th anniversary version also contains Ethiopian Geisha coffee. The entrance is also naturally smooth, and the smoothness passes through your taste buds and is drank through the throat. It will be stronger in the roasted coconut flavor than the previous one, more of a dessert stout. Geisha coffee may bring a slight acidity, but It's not obvious. It's still sweet but not greasy overall. The barrel and the wine blend perfectly together! Maybe the previous one was too amazing, so this one didn’t get full marks. 2023.5.14 Open the can and drink

IV (Four).translatedComment: My long-time favorite Brazil in the final this time in this format. Multi-step barreling and suitable sweetness. Bourbon, coffee and chocolate. Great beer! It was a memorable World Cup final 5/5 and it's great that Messi got the crown for his wonderful career.

Overdrive.comment: Ap: 92; Ar: 89; Sa: 93; Se: 94; Co: 91 - Média: 91.8. Sobe a nota. Lote pareceu melhor. Obviamente mais fresca e com notável maior cremosidade e brilho. Aroma de 🍍 e especiado bem intensos. Na boca o grapefruit domina. Drinkability absurdo. Ótima! 4.1.
Overdrive.translatedComment: Ap: 92; Air: 89; Sa: 93; If: 94; Co: 91 - Average: 91.8. Raise the grade. Lot looked better. Obviously fresher and with notable greater creaminess and shine. Very intense 🍍 and spicy aroma. In the mouth the grapefruit dominates. Absurd drinkability. Excellent! 4.1.

Overdrive.comment: É uma EMOÇÃO voltar a beber um Overdrive. A primeira NEIPA brasileira. Inspirada na Heady-Topper. E apesar de ter sido lançada em 2016 não envelheceu. As notas de pêssego, maracujá e abacaxi maduro permanecem bem pronunciados. O estilo evoluiu.👇
Overdrive.translatedComment: It's a THRILL to drink an Overdrive again. The first Brazilian NEIPA. Inspired by Heady-Topper. And despite being released in 2016, it hasn't aged. Notes of peach, passion fruit and ripe pineapple remain very pronounced. The style has evolved.👇

Overdrive.comment: Deliciosa. Referência no estilo que merece o hype em torno, equilibrada, turva, suculenta, corpo sedoso, macio e sedutor, frutas amarelas explodindo, pêssego e abacaxi principalmente, álcool imperceptível, um ótimo exemplar do estilo
Overdrive.translatedComment: Delicious. A reference in the style that deserves the hype around it, balanced, cloudy, juicy, silky, soft and seductive body, exploding yellow fruits, peach and pineapple mainly, imperceptible alcohol, a great example of the style

When you drink it, the rich cocoa aroma explodes directly on your tongue. What I didn't expect was that this wine was not sweet. As a sweet person, I would have scored higher if I had a dessert.

Cookie de Chocolate.comment: Talvez fora da validade? Talvez lote zuado? Boa. Mas não achei aquelas coisas. Meio sem diferencial. Densa. Um pouco amanteigada? Parece uma ótima base, mas sem brilho. Nada perto de dude, Tarin, ou Spartacus… já tomei stouts da Salvador melhores tb 22.
Cookie de Chocolate.translatedComment: Maybe out of date? Maybe a bad batch? Good. But I didn't find those things. Half without difference. Dense. A little buttery? It looks like a great foundation, but lacks shine. Nothing close to dude, Tarin, or Spartacus… I've had better Salvador stouts too 22.

Cookie de Chocolate.comment: Pastry excelente! Proposta cumprida com excelência! Além de café com cookie de chocolate, senti baunilha, avelã, coco queimado, doce de leite, e torra. A sensação de boca é ótima, e o retrogosto impecável. Ponto negativo: adstringência, somente.

In addition to coffee with chocolate cookie, I tasted vanilla, hazelnut, burnt coconut, dulce de leche, and roast. The mouthfeel is great, and the aftertaste is impeccable. Negative point: only astringency.

Cookie de Chocolate.comment: Praticamente uma sobremesa líquida! Muito aroma e sabor de café, chocolate, baunilha, avelã, biscoito e torrado. Sensacional! Só o álcool aparente que incomoda mas tbm pelo volume alcoólico já era de se esperar. Fiquei com vontade de guardar uma.
Cookie de Chocolate.translatedComment: Practically a liquid dessert! Lots of aroma and flavor of coffee, chocolate, vanilla, hazelnut, biscuit and roast. Sensational! It's only the apparent alcohol that bothers us, but also due to the alcoholic volume, it was to be expected. I wanted to keep one.

Cookie de Chocolate.comment: Cerveja maravilhosa, mas esperava mais dulçor para o estilo.
Cookie de Chocolate.translatedComment: Wonderful beer, but I expected more sweetness for the style.

Cookie de Chocolate.comment: Não sei dei azar ou se o paladar não tava apurado, mas não peguei nadinha de avelã nesse novo lote 🥺. Peguei mt cacau e café, com sutil baunilha e torra. Tava uma pastry comum, sem aquele brilho de cookie. Pena!
Cookie de Chocolate.translatedComment: I don't know if I was unlucky or if my taste buds weren't perfect, but I didn't get any hazelnut in this new batch 🥺. I got a lot of cocoa and coffee, with subtle vanilla and roast. It was a common pastry, without that cookie shine. Pity!

Cookie de Chocolate.comment: Só pelo o aroma já é possível matar a fome rsrs. O avelã e o café tostado estão bem presente. A cremosidade também é um destaque. Excelente! Obs.: postando do desktop. Aqui estou limitado a diversas funções as quais gostaria de usá-las.
Cookie de Chocolate.translatedComment: Just by the aroma it is possible to satisfy your hunger lol. The hazelnut and roasted coffee are very present. The creaminess is also a highlight. Great! Note: posting from desktop. Here I am limited to several functions that I would like to use.

Cookie de Chocolate.comment: Aroma de avelãs continua lindão. Corpo mais baixo no tap, com mais ênfase no café, mas mesmo assim nuts, cacau e baunilha estão bem presentes. Daquelas pastries q aquece a alma. Clássico absoluto da Salvador.
Cookie de Chocolate.translatedComment: Hazelnut aroma is still beautiful. Lower body on tap, with more emphasis on coffee, but even so nuts, cocoa and vanilla are very present. One of those pastries that warms the soul. Absolute Salvador classic.

Cookie de Chocolate.comment: 哪怕杯壁下流你也哪怕杯壁下流你也能获得一个咖啡焦糖色绵密且非常好喝的美丽持久的酒头（泡沫）快要溢出的时候我喝了三口，一定要尝试闻到咖啡 巧克力 香草 和香甜口感顺滑细腻稠 酒体够意思但不是那么厚那么浓稠 这是我喜欢的点 相比某些涛特没那么腻 适合畅饮配餐味道是巧克力和咖啡融合的很好 相对低的苦度和酒体很平衡 口味不多变（层次不多）但稳定的咖啡巧克力持续虚区（输出） 香气也很足收口干净（甚至有回甘 回味还是小咖啡巧克力 不苦清爽但到位感觉是很厉害的东西 （我涛子喝的少没见识巴西有东西 4.6
Cookie de Chocolate.translatedComment: Even if the side of the cup is down, you can still get a coffee caramel color, dense and very delicious, beautiful and long-lasting head (foam). I took three sips when it was about to overflow. I must try to smell the coffee, chocolate, vanilla and The sweet taste is smooth, delicate and thick. The body of the wine is interesting but not so thick or thick. This is what I like. Compared with some totes, it is not so greasy. It is suitable for all-you-can-drink meals. The taste is a good blend of chocolate and coffee, and the bitterness and alcohol are relatively low. The body is very balanced, the taste is not changeable (not many layers) but the coffee chocolate is stable and continues to be weak (output). The aroma is also very sufficient and cleans the mouth (even has a sweet aftertaste). The small coffee chocolate is not bitter and refreshing, but it feels very powerful when it is in place. (I, Taozi, drink less and have never seen anything in Brazil. 4.6

Elephants' Graveyard.comment: Um licor!Uma obra-prima! Café, chocolate, baunilha, biscoito, amendoim. Torrado. Dulçor agradável sem ser enjoativo. Linda! Negra como ébano. Só cuidado com os 13º de álcool. Ainda bem q são só 375 ml. Mais podem te derrubar.
Elephants' Graveyard.translatedComment: A liqueur! A masterpiece! Coffee, chocolate, vanilla, cookie, peanuts. Roasted. Pleasant sweetness without being cloying. Beautiful! Black as ebony. Just be careful with 13% alcohol. Good thing it's only 375 ml. More can bring you down.

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Totalement Bourbon !!!! Barrel aged, vanille gourmande ! Une très belle découverte ! Merci Bapt P. !! Félicitations pour ta 5000eme !!
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Totally Bourbon!!!! Barrel aged, gourmet vanilla! A very nice discovery! Thank you Bapt P.!! Congratulations on your 5000th!!

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: -0.25 for not filling my glass till the 10cl line 😝Even with that, a very good beer
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: -0.25 for not filling my glass till the 10cl line 😝Even with that, a very good beer

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Hoge verwachtingen van doordat #2 erg bij mij in de smaak viel. Eerste indruk geen koolzuur whatsoever…. 🤔 wat dunner dan #2 maar na verloop van tijd ontvouwt het zich als een goede wijn en is de smaak nog steeds indrukwekkend. Anders maar toch goed 😊
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: High expectations because I really liked #2. First impression no carbon dioxide whatsoever…. 🤔 a bit thinner than #2 but over time it unfolds like a fine wine and the taste is still impressive. Different but still good 😊

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Já passou do seu auge, dulçor bem alto, muito achocolatado e baunilha. Puro um todinho! O Bourbon aparece pouco!
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: It's past its prime, very high sweetness, very chocolatey and vanilla. Just a little pure! Bourbon appears very little!

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Passou do auge.… Dulçor dominante. Baunilha e chocolate em evidência. Bourbon médio baixo. Ainda vale o rolê!
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Past its prime.… Dominant sweetness. Vanilla and chocolate in evidence. Medium low bourbon. Still worth the ride!

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Excelente! Dois ISO de bobeira numa segunda-feira, desceu macio demais. Barrilzão, muito chocolate, álcool pegando leve no fim, pelo preço de 25$ por ISO fica ainda melhor ❤️🙌🏽
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Great! Two silly ISOs on a Monday, it went down too smoothly. Barrel, lots of chocolate, alcohol taking it easy at the end, for the price of $25 per ISO it's even better ❤️🙌🏽

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Às cegas. Mantendo a nota dada.
Nuts and coffee. Vanilla. Wood. Bourbon. Rich, spiced. Oily, syrupy.
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Nuts and coffee. Vanilla. Wood. Bourbon. Rich, spiced. Oily, syrupy.

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Blubberdik! Veel choco, wat koffie en lekker boozy. Afdronk blijft lang hangen. Echt genieten. Zou Tomo 2 hier nog overheen kunnen?
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Blubberdik! Lots of chocolate, some coffee and nice and boozy. Aftertaste lingers for a long time. Really enjoy. Could Tomo 2 overcome this?

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Thanks Ronald R.  Damn near barrel aged perfection!
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Thanks Ronald R.  Damn near barrel aged perfection!

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: 深黑，无泡沫。闻香木质气息厚重，酱味，较弱香草。回温后香草非常明显，尾段一些生豆，黑巧克力感受。酒体中等厚度，细腻，苦甜混合，完美黑巧口感。
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Deep black, no lather. The aroma is thick and woody, with a sauce flavor and a weak vanilla flavor. After warming up, the vanilla is very obvious, with some green beans and dark chocolate feeling at the end. The wine is medium-bodied, delicate, bitter-sweet, and has a perfect dark and subtle taste.

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Omnomnom even better now! Thx DJB B.
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Omnomnom even better now! Thx DJB B.

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Fouah. Un gros is comme on les aime. Chocolat, café, vanille, bourbon, légèrement boozy, gourmand mais pas écœurant. Elle mérite sa note, et sa place dans le top 5 du billie's !
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Fow. A big one is just the way we like it. Chocolate, coffee, vanilla, bourbon, slightly boozy, indulgent but not cloying. She deserves her rating, and her place in billie's top 5!

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Big and smooth with an underlying dark coffee roast and a good dose of vanilla to soften the roast and all those barrels. Thanks Dennis B. !
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Big and smooth with an underlying dark coffee roast and a good dose of vanilla to soften the roast and all those barrels. Thanks Dennis B. !

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Sterke cacao smaak, barrel komt ook mooi door. Heerlijk! This is Sparta!

Aretê - Tomo 1.comment: Geweldige vaten en wat wil je ook met Four Roses, Buffalo Trace en Woodford Reserve?! Tikkeltje boozy hierdoor, wat deze alleen maar beter maakt.. Dikke chocolade met een bak aan vanille en een scheutje scherp geroaste koffie!
Aretê - Tomo 1.translatedComment: Great barrels and what else could you want with Four Roses, Buffalo Trace and Woodford Reserve?! A bit boozy, which only makes it better... Thick chocolate with a hint of vanilla and a dash of sharp roasted coffee!

Rizoma.translatedComment: Another great beer from Dogma, an aromatic Double Ipa with moderate bitterness with citrus, resinous and fruity notes.

Rizoma.translatedComment: I miss root ipa!

Rizoma.comment: Floreali di cannabis, agrumati amari, fruttati tropicali. Vegetali freschi di conifere in evidenza. Ottimo etg. Interessante nota piccante.
Rizoma.translatedComment: Cannabis florals, bitter citrus, tropical fruity. Fresh coniferous plants highlighted. Excellent etg. Interesting spicy note.

Rizoma.comment: Elegancia e potencia andando juntosLevemente resinosa com amargor presente e citricidade equilibrando o conjunto.O corpo fácil de beber ate o final
Rizoma.translatedComment: Elegance and power walking togetherSlightly resinous with present bitterness and citrusness balancing the whole.The body is easy to drink with a tee or finish

Rizoma.comment: Minha primeira cerveja no mundodas especiais, que despertou minha paixão, e que me levou a pesquisar e fazer o curso de sommelier. Continua simplesmente espetacular e sensacional
Rizoma.translatedComment: My first beer in the specialty world, which awakened my passion, and which led me to research and take the sommelier course. It remains simply spectacular and sensational

Rizoma.comment: Essa versão estava mais lupulada que nunca, o extremo do sabor.

Rizoma.comment: Linda lata e ótima breja
Rizoma.translatedComment: Beautiful can and great beer

Rizoma.comment: Uma IPA raiz muito saborosa! Amargor top, cítrica e resinosa. Boa formação e retenção de espuma. Muito boa!
Rizoma.translatedComment: A very tasty root IPA! Top bitterness, citrusy and resinous. Good foam formation and retention. Very good!

Rizoma.comment: Aaagora sim! Finalmente posso dizer que bebi a famosa Dogma Rizoma! Porque a 1ª experiência foi triste.Aroma intenso, com frutado cítrico e resinoso. Deliciosamente amarga. Uma inesperada maciez que me agradou muito. Essa cerveja tava dilícia demais!
Rizoma.translatedComment: Aanow yes! Finally I can say that I drank the famous Dogma Rizoma! Because the first experience was sad. Intense aroma, with citrus and resinous fruitiness. Deliciously bitter. An unexpected softness that I really liked. This beer was so delicious!

Rizoma.comment: Não dá para dizer que essa é a melhor breja do estorno k estilo ainda hoje! Muito aroma de frutas tropicais, sabor de frutas amarelas e de caroço, principalmente maracujá, e o corpo leve e sequinho permitindo beber litros! Um clássico da cerveja artesanal
Rizoma.translatedComment: It's impossible to say that this is the best beer in the style to this day! Lots of aroma of tropical fruits, flavor of yellow and stone fruits, especially passion fruit, and the light and dry body allows you to drink liters! A craft beer classic

SuperSymmetry.comment: Powerful set. Herbal, grassy, spicy, piney. Skunky and dank. Rich juicy/peachy core. Citrus, orange, passion, mango, pineapple, starfruit, hog plum. Huge layers. Ends dry, bitter, resinous. Great punch. Low-medium bodied, silky, smooth, crispy. So easy.
SuperSymmetry.translatedComment: Powerful set. Herbal, grassy, spicy, piney. Skunky and dank. Rich juicy/peachy core. Citrus, orange, passion, mango, pineapple, starfruit, hog plum. Huge layers. Ends dry, bitter, resinous. Great punch. Low-medium bodied, silky, smooth, crispy. So easy.

SuperSymmetry.comment: Melhor tripel ipa que bebi, um milkshake de lúpulo,  juicy D+, espuma densa, mto aromática, cerveja encorpadassa ,sedosa, sensação aveludada, cremosa. Sabor pêssego, damasco, manga, retrogosto c/ amargor potente redondo e sensação alcoólica. Sensacional
SuperSymmetry.translatedComment: Best tripel ipa I've drunk, a hop milkshake, D+ juicy, dense foam, very aromatic, full-bodied, silky beer, velvety, creamy sensation. Peach, apricot, mango flavor, aftertaste with powerful round bitterness and alcoholic sensation. Sensational

SuperSymmetry.translatedComment: Little balance, with overdone sweetness. Finish with spice, without creaminess. Low aroma and present abv. It's a little far from the NE I've tried.

SuperSymmetry.comment: Impossível ser a msm cerveja, q cor é essa? Cadê o corpo aveludado? Que decepção ver a HP vendendo essa cerveja como se fosse a Supersymmetry e cobrando caro.
SuperSymmetry.translatedComment: It’s impossible to be the same beer, what color is that? Where's the velvety body? What a disappointment to see HP selling this beer as if it were Supersymmetry and charging a lot.

SuperSymmetry.translatedComment: Great flavor to my palate, pulsating bitterness, fruity beat of aromas... more body deserved a higher rating, great show... it's worth knowing and delighting in this explosion

SuperSymmetry.comment: Pra mim era a melhor TIPA do Brasil, era! O que aconteceu com esse lote? Que cor é essa? Cadê aquele veludo, corpo? Vendo check ins anteriores, é bizarra a diferença! Perfil na boca é outro. Dulçor elevado, picância incômoda no final gole, aroma fraco!
SuperSymmetry.translatedComment: For me, it was the best TIPA in Brazil, it was! What happened to this batch? What color is this? Where's that velvet, body? Looking at previous check-ins, the difference is bizarre! Mouth profile is another. High sweetness, uncomfortable spiciness at the end of the sip, weak aroma!

Cosmic Blur.translatedComment: Aroma brings tons of info. Rich coffee, coconut, nuts/hazelnut. Deep choc, fudge feel. Cake, cookie. Pastry. Burnt, astringent, roasty, sugary, syrupy. Heavy, slow. Bodied, oily, chewy. Mouthcoating. Tiny metallic, umami. Delicious. Warming. Dessert pick.

Cosmic Blur.comment: Sucesso! Uma delícia. Aroma de wafer de avelã, chocolate ao leite, melado de cana, tabaco e café. Pesada, densa, cheia de camadas. Padrão internacional. Em barril de cachaça ficaria perfeita. Belezura.
Cosmic Blur.translatedComment: Success! A delight. Aroma of hazelnut wafer, milk chocolate, cane syrup, tobacco and coffee. Heavy, dense, full of layers. International standard. In a cachaça barrel it would be perfect. Beauty.

Cosmic Blur.translatedComment: Good tasty light beer

Cosmic Blur.comment: Absurdamente melhor que a primeira que tomei. Aromas e sabores intensos. Côco e avelã se destacam no aroma desde a abertura. No sabor, o café já domina no retrogosto.
Cosmic Blur.translatedComment: Absurdly better than the first one I took. Intense aromas and flavors. Coconut and hazelnut stand out in the aroma from the opening. In terms of flavor, coffee already dominates in the aftertaste.

Cosmic Blur.comment: Batch 2. Burnt, roasty, loaded. Minor acidity. Quite sweet, sticky, syrupy. Oily, almost chewy. Choc, cookie, cake, vanilla, nuts/hazelnuts, wood, coffee. Slightly astringent. Spiced, condimented. Good aging. Layers of info. Great set. Heavy, slow. Great.
Cosmic Blur.translatedComment: Batch 2. Burnt, roasty, loaded. Minor acidity. Quite sweet, sticky, syrupy. Oily, almost chewy. Choc, cookie, cake, vanilla, nuts/hazelnuts, wood, coffee. Slightly astringent. Spiced, condimented. Good aging. Layers of info. Great set. Heavy, slow. Great.

Cosmic Blur.comment: B1 x B2. Both batches fell hard from what i remembered. B1 had a lot of tobacco going on, with coffee and coconut still apparent. B2 was better on the nose, but worst on flavor. Felt like starting to get infected. Drink soon!
Cosmic Blur.translatedComment: B1 x B2. Both batches fell hard from what i remembered. B1 had a lot of tobacco going on, with coffee and coconut still apparent. B2 was better on the nose, but worst on flavor. Felt like starting to get infected. Drink soon!

Cosmic Blur.comment: Batch 1. Powerful roasted grip. Scented. Rich coffee, great aging. Burnt. Sweet. Licorice, dark choc, brownie, coconut, vanilla, almonds, wafer/cookie. Dessert notes. Sugary, sticky. Oily, thick, bodied. Quite astringent. Rich, complex. Amazing set. Huge.
Cosmic Blur.translatedComment: Batch 1. Powerful roasted grip. Scented. Rich coffee, great aging. Burnt. Sweet. Licorice, dark choc, brownie, coconut, vanilla, almonds, wafer/cookie. Dessert notes. Sugary, sticky. Oily, thick, bodied. Quite astringent. Rich, complex. Amazing set. Huge.

Cosmic Blur.comment: oh F. ! Foda-se! Só consigo lembrar de você quando bebo esta cerveja! Muito coco! Muita entrega! E, como te disse, precisa provar koala! Preciso dar um jeito. 🤣

Cosmic Blur.translatedComment: (bottle 07/2021) Below the previous batch. Coconut is the protagonist followed by hazelnut and light coffee. Medium high body. Light metallic. Sweetness and abv are controlled. CxB makes it less attractive. Koala's delivery never lived up to the price charged.

Pão de Mel.translatedComment: The beer is very pleasant to drink, its aroma is pure gingerbread, while in the mouth the combination of the taste of honey, chocolate and the toast of the grain is sensational.

Pão de Mel.comment: Besonders. Und das ist positiv gemeint. Danke Matty.

Pão de Mel.comment: ⁵⁰⁰¹Interessantes unbekanntes Aromenspektrum!Regt an zu einer regen und kreativen Diskussion über Aromen, brasilianische Kuchenkreationen und beyond. So soll es sein: Bier - in der Sache vereint.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: ⁵⁰⁰¹Interesting, unknown spectrum of flavors! Encourages a lively and creative discussion about flavors, Brazilian cake creations and beyond. That's how it should be: beer - united in the cause.

Pão de Mel.comment: Não emocionou tanto. Ainda lembra muito um bom Pão de mel. Um fundo de banana.  Licorosa leve
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: It wasn't as emotional. It still reminds me a lot of good honey bread. A banana background. Light liqueur

Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Already was better

Pão de Mel.comment: (30/05)Lote muito, mas muuuuito abaixo do primeiro que tomei.. Só aroma e sabor de Canela, extremamente enjoativo.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: (30/05) A lot, but soooo much smaller than the first one I took... Just the aroma and flavor of Cinnamon, extremely sickening.

Pão de Mel.comment: Pão de mel líquido, quase para tomar se colheradas, bem docinha, canela, chocolate, se destacam, degustada na 4 Feira do Caminho do queijo paulista
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Liquid honey bread, almost to be taken in spoonfuls, very sweet, cinnamon, chocolate, stand out, tasted at the 4 Feira do Caminho cheese fair in São Paulo

Pão de Mel.comment: Uma ris que enaltece o maple e cacau , alcoólico cremosa, bem encorpado, baixa carbonatação, mas agitação faz voltar o melhor sabor....
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: A drink that highlights maple and cocoa, creamy alcoholic, full-bodied, low carbonation, but stirring brings back the best flavor...

Pão de Mel.comment: 1a receita era incrível. Nova pão de mel está muito pesada na canela e cravo. Muito desequilibrada. Zoaram a cerveja
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: 1st recipe was incredible. Nova gingerbread is very heavy on the cinnamon and cloves. Very unbalanced. They made fun of the beer

Pão de Mel.comment: Tomei com meu pai na Tarin em BH. Gosto puro de pão de mel. Espetacular. Aumentei a nota.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: I took it with my father at Tarin in BH. Pure gingerbread taste. Amazing. I raised the grade.

Pão de Mel.comment: Let it warm up. Then the ginger is less sharp. Chocolate, honey and ginger make for a nice dessert. Still quite thick on the ginger. And while I don't like ginger, this combo of flavours makes it work. Glad I brought the bottle all the way from Brazil.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Let it warm up. Then the ginger is less sharp. Chocolate, honey and ginger make for a nice dessert. Still quite thick on the ginger. And while I don't like ginger, this combo of flavours makes it work. Glad I brought the bottle all the way from Brazil.

Pão de Mel.comment: Muy especiada. Es un dulce típico de Brasil. Canela, coco, gengibre...
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Very spicy. It is a typical sweet from Brazil. Cinnamon, coconut, ginger...

Pão de Mel.comment: Pão de mel 🍯 líquido
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Honey bread 🍯 liquid

Pão de Mel.comment: De ontem.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: From yesterday.

Pão de Mel.comment: A lot of cinnamon!
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: A lot of cinnamon!

Pão de Mel.comment: Pão de mel em forma de cerveja, que cerveja foda! Ótima opção pra acompanhar uma sobremesa. Saborosa , bem encorpada.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Gingerbread in the form of a beer, what a great beer! Great option to accompany a dessert. Tasty, very full-bodied.

Pão de Mel.comment: Lote 12Resenha no @math.mantovani no Instagram! 🤙🏻

Pão de Mel.translatedComment: last one :(   thankful that Evani saved these for me to share with CT

Pão de Mel.comment: No tap é ainda melhor.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: No tap is even better.

Pão de Mel.comment: Aroma excelente: mel, cravo, canela. Para disfarçar o dulçor exageraram no cravo. Muito cravo no início, mas ainda assim o dulçor excessivo aparece no final e não sai!
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Excellent aroma: honey, cloves, cinnamon. To disguise the sweetness, they exaggerated the cloves. Lots of cloves at the beginning, but still the excessive sweetness appears at the end and doesn't go away!

Pão de Mel.comment: Que cerveja foda, parece alguém cortando o pão de mel diante de você ?!
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: What a great beer, it looks like someone cutting gingerbread in front of you?!

Pão de Mel.comment: Aroma excelente. No paladar, acidez fora do padrão. Não tive sorte. 🥴😢
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Excellent aroma. On the palate, unusual acidity. No luck. 🥴😢

Pão de Mel.comment: No tap fica uma coisa maravilhosa. Cravo e canela com elegância. Aroma pao de mel puro. O álcool não se destaca como na versão em garrafa. Achei muito equalizada e condimentada. Amei
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: On tap there is something wonderful. Clove and cinnamon with elegance. Pure honey bread aroma. The alcohol doesn't stand out like it does in the bottled version. I found it very equalized and spicy. I loved

Pão de Mel.comment: Canela tomou conta e atrapalhou um pouco. Boa breja, base bem consistente e leve. No entanto, pela reputação, esperava mais...
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Cinnamon took over and got in the way a little. Good brew, very consistent and light base. However, based on the reputation, I expected more...

Pão de Mel.comment: Ótima
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Excellent

Pão de Mel.comment: Sem mais.Perfeição, se uma pessoa apenas "cheirasse" sem saber o que é, diria que era um pão de mel. E no palato, não deixa a desejar.Incrível.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: No more. Perfection, if a person just "smelled" it without knowing what it was, they would say it was gingerbread. And on the palate, it leaves nothing to be desired. Incredible.

Pão de Mel.comment: Late
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Late

Pão de Mel.comment: round 2...let's see how well it held up in Evani M. fridge for 10 months - looks like the sell by is 08/23

Pão de Mel.comment: Love this Christmas beer. Cheers Rodrigo P.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Love this Christmas beer. Cheers Rodrigo P.

Pão de Mel.comment: Extreem zoet
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Extremely sweet

Pão de Mel.comment: Extremamente ácida, avinagrada. Impossível de beber, tive que jogar fora pelo ralo. Já tomei a pão de mel outras vezes e sempre foi uma experiência sensacional, dessa vez foi terrível. Vou entrar em contato com o fabricante e o vendedor para alertar.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Extremely acidic, vinegary. Impossible to drink, I had to throw it down the drain. I've had gingerbread other times and it's always been a sensational experience, this time it was terrible. I will contact the manufacturer and seller to alert them.

Pão de Mel.comment: Surreal
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Surreal

Pão de Mel.comment: Um verdadeiro pão de mel! Pra quem é fã, vai amar!
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: A real gingerbread! For those who are fans, you will love it!

Pão de Mel.comment: Simplesmente incrível a semelhança com o doce. Mais leve que a versão em garrafa .
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: The resemblance to the candy is simply incredible. Lighter than the bottle version.

Pão de Mel.comment: Po nejlepší pizze co sem zatím v Brazil měl - dezert. Imitace místního medovníku. Super krémový, čokoláda, koření, medový. Sladký teda fest, ale to mi neva.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: After the best pizza I've had in Brazil so far - dessert. Imitation of a local honey tree. Super creamy, chocolate, spices, honey. Sweet fest, but I don't care.

Pão de Mel.comment: Intense | Spicy; Cocoa; Honey; Cinnamon; Cloves.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Intense | Spicy; Cocoa; Honey; Cinnamon; Cloves.

Pão de Mel.comment: REVISÃO. Ap: 98; Ar: 95; Sa: 96; Se: 97; Co: 96 - Média: 96.4. Corpo negro super denso. Muito turva. Aroma de canela evidente, mas não é agressivo. Leve mel. Na boca agrega chocolate e tosta da base. Sensação especiada (canela e cravo). Álcool presente.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: REVISION. Ap: 98; Air: 95; Sa: 96; If: 97; Co: 96 - Average: 96.4. Super dense black body. Very cloudy. Obvious cinnamon aroma, but not aggressive. Take honey. In the mouth it adds chocolate and toast to the base. Spicy sensation (cinnamon and clove). Alcohol present.

Pão de Mel.comment: Lote 11. Fantástica. Realmente emula um pão de mel: durante toda a degustação os adjuntos estão ali, canela, cardamomo e cravo. Café aparece com o aquecer da cerveja, o que deixa mais fácil de bebê-la. Sabor do café fecha os sabores. Aquecimento corporal.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Lot 11. Fantastic. It really emulates honey bread: throughout the tasting the adjuncts are there, cinnamon, cardamom and cloves. Coffee appears when the beer heats up, which makes it easier to drink. Coffee flavor rounds off the flavors. Body warming.

Pão de Mel.comment: Seems even sweeter than I remembered. Good dessert beer for whom likes this sticky style.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Seems even sweeter than I remembered. Good dessert beer for whom likes this sticky style.

Pão de Mel.comment: Heavy Pastry. Deep sweetness. Honey bread, cinnamon, cardamom. Choc, coffee, nuts, vanilla, caramel. Luscious dessert. Banana edge. Bodied, heavy, sticky, chewy. Slow. Syrupy, sugary. Luscious. Just beautiful. A lil' tiring. But some righteous. A monster.
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Heavy Pastry. Deep sweetness. Honey bread, cinnamon, cardamom. Choc, coffee, nuts, vanilla, caramel. Luscious dessert. Banana edge. Bodied, heavy, sticky, chewy. Slow. Syrupy, sugary. Luscious. Just beautiful. A lil' tiring. But some righteous. A monster.

Pão de Mel.comment: Been sitting in my fridge for 6 months already. The only thing it was missing was the lovely foam it might have otherwise fresh. Amazing. Is just amazing. (Duke R. Don’t worry there are still four fresh ones waiting for you)
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Been sitting in my fridge for 6 months already. The only thing it was missing was the lovely foam it might have otherwise fresh. Amazing. Is just amazing. (Duke R. Don’t worry there are still four fresh ones waiting for you)

Pão de Mel.comment: Still rockin’
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Still rockin’

Pão de Mel.comment: Boy, this is a heavyweight! It perfectly delivers what it claims, our 'pão de mel' which I love so much, oh, all the spices, hum... Thanks to my son that brought  it in his luggage. 🥰🥰
Pão de Mel.translatedComment: Boy, this is a heavyweight! It perfectly delivers what it claims, our 'pão de mel' which I love so much, oh, all the spices, hum... Thanks to my son that brought  it in his luggage. 🥰🥰

Rabbit Hole.comment: Algo deu errado
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Something went wrong

Rabbit Hole.comment: Pouco menos de 2 anos de guarda. Baixa carbonatação bem licorosa. Ainda espetacular
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Just under 2 years of custody. Low carbonation, very liqueur. Still spectacular

Rabbit Hole.comment: Aguentou bem o tempo de garrafa.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: It held up well for its bottle life.

Rabbit Hole.comment: rb 3,7
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: rb 3,7

Rabbit Hole.comment: Os adjuntos deram uma enfraquecida, mas ainda tá boa. Garrafa da versão antiga
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: The assistants weakened it, but it's still good. Old version bottle

Rabbit Hole.comment: A: coco, caramelo, nozes. P: chocolate meio-amargo, baunilha, coco queimado, torra suave, dulçor controlado, sobremesa sem ser enjoativa. Excelente.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: A: coconut, caramel, nuts. P: dark chocolate, vanilla, burnt coconut, soft roast, controlled sweetness, dessert without being cloying. Great.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Muito boa. Complexa e com diversas notas. Porém muito doce, deixando um pouco enjoativa. Excelente para finalizar.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Very good. Complex and with different notes. But very sweet, leaving it a little cloying. Excellent to finish.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Laaaaaaaaate, achei fodona.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Laaaaaaaate, I thought it was badass.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Minha eterna queridinha da HP. Sempre que posso tomo novamente. Coquinho e chocolate. Desta vez o sabor pareceu diferente, provavelmente por tomar a Ground Yourself antes.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: My eternal HP favorite. I take it again whenever I can. Coconut and chocolate. This time the flavor seemed different, probably due to taking Ground Yourself first.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Very nice and true to style. Sweet and full of spice.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Very nice and true to style. Sweet and full of spice.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Lote 699, o pior de todos. Venc. 09/19. Zero carbonatação. Aroma de baunilha e licor de nozes. Faltou corpo e intensidade. Sabor entrega tudo, mas sem empolgação. Envelhecimento não agregou nada. Quando a cerveja não está boa, não adianta guardar.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Lot 699, the worst of all. Win. 09/19. Zero carbonation. Aroma of vanilla and nut liqueur. It lacked body and intensity. Flavor delivers everything, but without excitement. Aging didn't add anything. When the beer is not good, there is no point in storing it.

Rabbit Hole.comment: O rótulo da cerveja indica 13% de ABV e não 9%  como informado pelo Untappd
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: The beer label indicates 13% ABV and not 9% as reported by Untappd

Rabbit Hole.comment: Tomando pela segunda vez, achei o adocicado dela mais interessante. Além disso, o amargor do café que fica na boca depois é muito bom, contrastando muito bem com o sabor do coco.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Taking it for the second time, I found its sweetness more interesting. Furthermore, the bitterness of the coffee that remains in the mouth afterwards is very good, contrasting very well with the flavor of the coconut.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Uma sobremesa líquida de corpo aveludado, a Rabbit Hole entrega o que seu conceito propõe. Pra mim, o ideal seria vir em uma porção menor, pq acabou pesando no final 🐇🕳
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: A liquid dessert with a velvety body, Rabbit Hole delivers what its concept proposes. For me, the ideal would be to come in a smaller portion, because it ended up weighing me down in the end 🐇🕳

Rabbit Hole.comment: Lote 485. Aroma de baunilha e nozes. Dulçor foi embora e a adstringencia do torrado ficou mais intensa. Sabor entrega muito chocolate ao leite, baunilha, nozes e um torradão intenso. Melhorou muito com o tempo, mas não foi um dos melhores lotes.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Lot 485. Vanilla and nutty aroma. The sweetness went away and the astringency of the roast became more intense. Flavor delivers a lot of milk chocolate, vanilla, nuts and an intense toastiness. It improved a lot with time, but it wasn't one of the best batches.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Versão garrafinha. Chocolate amargo, Coco torrado no aroma e sabor. Corpo na medida certa. Excelente.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Bottle version. Dark chocolate, toasted coconut in aroma and flavor. Body in the right size. Great.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Licorous, coconut, nutty, luxurious coffee aroma. What a treat! Somewhat acidic, which I find shouldn’t be there at all, otherwise would’ve been amazing
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Licorous, coconut, nutty, luxurious coffee aroma. What a treat! Somewhat acidic, which I find shouldn’t be there at all, otherwise would’ve been amazing

Rabbit Hole.comment: Com o tempo senti uma azeitona... Não era o esperado...
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Over time I felt an olive... It wasn't what I expected...

Rabbit Hole.comment: Continua espetacular! Garrafa da primeira versão
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Still spectacular! First version bottle

Rabbit Hole.comment: Cês tão de brincadeira... essa é bruta demais, parece que estou comendo Prestígio de coco queimado, espetacular
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: You're so kidding... this one is too gross, it feels like I'm eating burnt coconut Prestige, spectacular

Rabbit Hole.comment: Que sobremesa! Aroma de coco queimado, baunilha, chocolate, uva passa. Na boca, corpo bem denso e aveludado, porém, nada pesado. Sabor torrado, coco queimado e o chocolate. Retrogosto bem torrado muito bom. Álcool imperceptível. Doce mas com equilíbrio!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: What a dessert! Aroma of burnt coconut, vanilla, chocolate, raisins. In the mouth, very dense and velvety body, however, not heavy. Roasted flavor, burnt coconut and chocolate. Very good, well-roasted aftertaste. Imperceptible alcohol. Sweet but with balance!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Que breja animal ! Aromas do coco,  manjar negro , uma verdadeira sobremesa líquida ... breja complexa e top
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: What an animal beast! Aromas of coconut, black manjar, a true liquid dessert... complex and top notch

Rabbit Hole.comment: Hocus pocus né?! Coco bem sutil, não é tanto licorosa, mas muito saborosa. Perfeito pra fechar uma noite
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Hocus pocus, right?! Very subtle coconut, not so much liqueur, but very tasty. Perfect to end a night

Rabbit Hole.comment: Ótima RIS! Chocolate com coco + alcoólico presente mas equilibrado!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Great RIS! Chocolate with coconut + alcohol present but balanced!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Único ponto que achei um pouco negativo é a intensidade do coco que fica no final da boca, mas em geral a cerveja é muito boa!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: The only point that I found a little negative is the intensity of the coconut at the end of the mouth, but in general the beer is very good!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Ap: 96; Ar: 94; Sa: 95; Se: 95; Co: 95 - Média: 95 (Bom corpo, cremosa e negra. Aroma de nozes, coco queimado e cacau com caramelo. Sabor que acompanha somado ao torrado típico. Sensação oleosa e com residual alcoólico agradável. Bom exemplar).
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Ap: 96; Air: 94; Sa: 95; If: 95; Co: 95 - Average: 95 (Good body, creamy and black. Aroma of nuts, burnt coconut and cocoa with caramel. Flavor that accompanies the typical roast. Oily sensation and pleasant residual alcohol. Good example).

Rabbit Hole.comment: Nez très agréable, mais un peu trop légère par la suite. Cacao très présent, mais pas en longueur de bouche.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Very pleasant nose, but a little too light afterwards. Cocoa very present, but not in the length of the mouth.

Rabbit Hole.comment: From a few weeks ago.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: From a few weeks ago.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Muito "diferente" mas atende a proposta que oferece.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Very "different" but meets the proposal it offers.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Pra fechar o dia 02/10. Realmente trouxe a idéia de Pastry Stout. O coco destoou do conjunto, em excesso, tirando o holofote do chocolate. Este apareceu, mas em segundo plano, principalmente no aroma. As nozes complementam, principalmente no retrogosto.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: To close on 10/02. It really brought up the idea of Pastry Stout. The coconut clashed with the set, in excess, taking the spotlight away from the chocolate. This appeared, but in the background, mainly in the aroma. The nuts complement it, especially in the aftertaste.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Puta que eu pariu!!!! Parabéns. Espetacular
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Holy shit!!!! Congratulations. Amazing

Rabbit Hole.comment: Surreal - acho que essa é a palavra. Rabbit Hole é um misto de uma cerveja licorada com uma sobremesa. Um corpo extremamente cremoso, com um dulçor digno de uma sobremesa no fim de um maravilhoso jantar. Tinha altas expectativas - e que foram atendidas.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Surreal - I think that's the word. Rabbit Hole is a mix of a liqueur beer and a dessert. An extremely creamy body, with a sweetness worthy of a dessert at the end of a wonderful dinner. I had high expectations - and they were met.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Coco super presente, maravilhosa! 🤩
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Super present coconut, wonderful! 🤩

Rabbit Hole.comment: Coloração escura, opaca e espuma bege de boa formação e retenção.Aromas intensos de baunilha, café, chocolate, cacau, torrefação e coco.Apresenta retrogosto de chocolate amargo e coco. Prestígio em forma de cerveja. Espetacular!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Dark, opaque color and beige foam with good formation and retention. Intense aromas of vanilla, coffee, chocolate, cocoa, roasting and coconut. Features an aftertaste of dark chocolate and coconut. Prestige in the form of beer. Amazing!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Não esperava tanto. Mas me surpreendeu. RIS suave. Alguns fos ingredientes um pouvo enjoativos.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: I didn't expect so much. But it surprised me. Smooth LOL. Some ingredients were a little sickening.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Coco queimado!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Burnt coconut!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Comprei quando a garrafa era maior e a fórmula diferente. Era fantástica. Uma das melhores cervejas. Essa "nova" versão em garrafa menor simplesmente a cervejaria perdeu a mão. Voltem ao que essa cerveja era!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: I bought it when the bottle was bigger and the formula was different. It was fantastic. One of the best beers. This "new" version in a smaller bottle simply lost the brewery's hand. Go back to what this beer was!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Chocolate, coco queimado, baunilha em extrema evidência... 13% de alcool muito bem equilibrado. Corpo extremamente alto e aveludado. Excelente
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Chocolate, burnt coconut, vanilla in extreme evidence... 13% alcohol very well balanced. Extremely tall and velvety body. Great

Rabbit Hole.comment: Late check-in
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Late check-in

Rabbit Hole.comment: Bah, Bela execução, entrega tudo o que promete!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Bah, Beautiful execution, delivers everything it promises!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Late check-in.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Late check-in.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Baita RIS. Em camadas como tem que ser! Nada muito se sobrepondo. Tudo equilibrado e no extremo. Belíssima execução. Saúde
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Great RIS. Layered as it should be! Nothing too overlapping. Everything balanced and at the extreme. Beautiful execution. Health

Rabbit Hole.comment: Licor de coco! Corpo alto, doce, licorosa, aroma de sorvete de coco. Receita que já era boa ficou ainda melhor.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Coconut liqueur! High body, sweet, liqueur, aroma of coconut ice cream. A recipe that was already good just got even better.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Esse cerveja é uma sobremesa licoresa! Alcoólica na medida, sabores de coco e chocolate bem marcantes! Experiência sensacional
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: This beer is a liqueur dessert! Perfectly alcoholic, very striking coconut and chocolate flavors! Sensational experience

Rabbit Hole.comment: Que surpresa! :)
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: What a surprise! :)

Rabbit Hole.comment: Awesome dark chocolate, coconut and nuts flavour, grade should higher but my bottle had a carbonation problem, plus, too sweet
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Awesome dark chocolate, coconut and nuts flavour, grade should higher but my bottle had a carbonation problem, plus, too sweet

Rabbit Hole.comment: Bela RIS , densa e com o coco bem pronunciado! Nesse frio, vai bem demais!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Beautiful RIS, dense and with a very pronounced coconut! In this cold weather, it goes really well!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Perfeita e brava
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Perfect and brave

Rabbit Hole.comment: Ficou bem bacana! Mas a versão anterior era melhor hein!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: It turned out really cool! But the previous version was better huh!

Rabbit Hole.comment: Doce!! Coco queimado predominando o aroma e sabor, seguido da baunilha e chocolate amargo com um amendoado no fim. Super densa e oleosa, porém com um dulçor muito elevado, deixando-a enjoativa e artificial. Boa experiência, mas não repetiria.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Sweet!! Burnt coconut predominates the aroma and flavor, followed by vanilla and dark chocolate with an almond at the end. Super dense and oily, but with a very high sweetness, leaving it cloying and artificial. Good experience, but I wouldn't repeat it.

Rabbit Hole.comment: O que é essa nova fórmula? Dessa, mais achocolatada, mais licorosa, meu Deus! Um veludo.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: What is this new formula? This one, more chocolatey, more liqueur, my God! A velvet.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Bastante licorosa. Coco em primeiro plano. Cacau forte tbm. Prestigio liquido. Doce.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Quite liqueur. Coconut in the foreground. Strong cocoa too. Liquid prestige. Sweet.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Late check-in.
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Late check-in.

Rabbit Hole.comment: Obsceno!
Rabbit Hole.translatedComment: Obscene!

FWIW.comment: Yellow hazy NEDIPA. Strong citrus fruity nose. Lemon fruity take. Juicy body with a citrus fruity hops profile, hold a sour passion fruity touch. Lemony refreshing and fruity with green pineapple and pomelo in between. Quite deep. Medium fruity finish
FWIW.translatedComment: Yellow hazy NEDIPA. Strong citrus fruity nose. Lemon fruity take. Juicy body with a citrus fruity hops profile, hold a sour passion fruity touch. Lemony refreshing and fruity with green pineapple and pomelo in between. Quite deep. Medium fruity finish

FWIW.comment: Thanks to Chiel S. En Tim G.
FWIW.translatedComment: Thanks to Chiel S. En Tim G.

FWIW.comment: Lci, vergeten in te checkn zo alderbassens lekker sappie
FWIW.translatedComment: Lci, forgot to check in so alderbassens nice sappie

FWIW.comment: Goed voorbeeld doet volgen J P. #bbb33
FWIW.translatedComment: Good example to follow J P. #bbb33

FWIW.comment: Topper voor iets wat ik minder vaak drink. Spoelt zacht door de mond. Lichte citrus verfijnd de afdronk. Beetje juicy hop zorgt voor een fijne tinteling.
FWIW.translatedComment: Great for something I drink less often. Rinses gently through the mouth. Light citrus refines the aftertaste. A little juicy hop provides a nice tingling sensation.

FWIW.comment: Spaanse kip uit de slowcooker, bodempje voor vanavond :)
FWIW.translatedComment: Spanish chicken from the slow cooker, base for tonight :)

FWIW.comment: Hij is niet uitdagend, maar wat hij doet doet ie goed. En na de laatste slok was ik teleurgesteld.... Want ik wou meer!
FWIW.translatedComment: He is not challenging, but what he does he does well. And after the last sip I was disappointed... Because I wanted more!

FWIW.comment: Mocht er eentje van mezelf op deze spebi avond
FWIW.translatedComment: I wish I had one of my own on this special evening

FWIW.comment: Meloen en citrusfruit wat de klok slaat. Licht floraal randje.
FWIW.translatedComment: Melon and citrus fruit are key. Light floral edge.

FWIW.comment: Lekker sappig, beetje romig, grassig in de verte. Heerlijk zacht.
FWIW.translatedComment: Nice and juicy, slightly creamy, grassy in the distance. Wonderfully soft.

FWIW.comment: Mijn liefde voor Spartacus begint nu wel serieuze vormen aan te nemen, hoe kan het ook anders met zo’n naam. 🔴⚪️🔴⚪️ Aromatische fruittonen, ook hier niet vol in je bakkes, maar wat afgevlakt. Denk dat less hier more is. Ik zal hem moreless leren!
FWIW.translatedComment: My love for Spartacus is now starting to take serious shape, how could it be otherwise with a name like that. 🔴⚪️🔴⚪️ Aromatic fruit tones, not full in the mouth here either, but somewhat smoothed out. Guess less is more here. I will teach him moreless!

FWIW.comment: Zacht biertje! Spartacus altijd wel goed
Mooi hip slokje en mooi plaatje, heel christelijk.
FWIW.translatedComment: Nice hip sip and beautiful picture, very Christian.

FWIW.comment: Сочно, воняет, послевкусие попроще. Варится в Голландии.
FWIW.translatedComment: Juicy, stinks, the aftertaste is simpler. Brewed in Holland.

FWIW.comment: Heerlijk biertje, gisteren vergeten in te checken
FWIW.translatedComment: Great beer, forgot to check in yesterday

FWIW.comment: Mooi spul. Fruitig met een hoppige finish.
FWIW.translatedComment: Nice stuff. Fruity with a hoppy finish.

FWIW.comment: Weer een lekkere van Spartacus sappig,hazy,fruitig met een fijne bitterUntappd 4,3
FWIW.translatedComment: Another tasty one from Spartacus, juicy, hazy, fruity with a nice bitterUntappd 4.3

FWIW.comment: For What It’s Worth: De echte Spartacussen met volledig gedrukte blikken waren toch wel een klasse apart. De Coca-Cola. Dit is meer First Choice. Prima maar niet de echte. Ingrediënten staan erop in het NL. De Brazilianen hebben hun ziel verkocht. Triest.
FWIW.translatedComment: For What It's Worth: The real Spartacus with fully printed cans were in a class of their own. The Coca Cola. This is more First Choice. Fine, but not the real thing. Ingredients are listed in Dutch. The Brazilians have sold their souls. Sad.

FWIW.comment: Heerlijke DIPA met citrus grapefruit, limoen en tropisch fruit. Fantastische verrassing.
FWIW.translatedComment: Delicious DIPA with citrus grapefruit, lime and tropical fruit. Fantastic surprise.

FWIW.comment: Tropisch fruit, ananas, mango, licht citrus, grapefruit. Geel en hazy, troebel, heerlijk..
FWIW.translatedComment: Tropical fruit, pineapple, mango, light citrus, grapefruit. Yellow and hazy, cloudy, delicious...

FWIW.comment: Foto spreekt boekdelen, lekker dik. Mooi juicy, fruitig en hoppig. Echt een aanrader
FWIW.translatedComment: Photo speaks volumes, nice and thick. Nicely juicy, fruity and hoppy. Highly recommended

FWIW.comment: Ah yesss, great dipa. Goes with great music.
FWIW.translatedComment: Ah yesss, great dipa. Goes with great music.

FWIW.comment: Zooo juicy, prachtige hoppen, heel fruitig. Mooi weer.
FWIW.translatedComment: Sooo juicy, beautiful hops, very fruity. Nice weather.
Lots of flavor, lots of fruit

Barrel Aged ICON Double Chocolate Peanut.comment: Excellent ! Gros chocolat et beurre de cacahuète ! Bourbon bien rond, vanillé, boisé, ça réchauffe bien ! Belle texture épaisse, avec de super fines bulles. Grosse longueur bourbon et chocolat.
Barrel Aged ICON Double Chocolate Peanut.translatedComment: Excellent ! Big chocolate and peanut butter! Very round, vanilla, woody bourbon, it warms up well! Nice thick texture, with super fine bubbles. Big length bourbon and chocolate.

Barrel Aged ICON Double Chocolate Peanut.comment: Mais marrom do que preta. Aroma com muito bourbon/barril, amendoim/paçoca aparecem bem, mas com menor intensidade, cacau complementa. No paladar é deeensa, quase mastigável. Álcool escapa um bocado, final do gole lembra mesmo um bourbon, mas com minduim.
Barrel Aged ICON Double Chocolate Peanut.translatedComment: More brown than black. Aroma with a lot of bourbon/barrel, peanuts/paçoca appear well, but with less intensity, cocoa complements. On the palate it is deeensa, almost chewy. Alcohol escapes a bit, the end of the sip is reminiscent of bourbon, but with minced meat.

Barrel Aged ICON Double Chocolate Peanut.comment: Wahoo!
Barrel Aged ICON Double Chocolate Peanut.translatedComment: Wahoo!

Barrel Aged ICON Double Chocolate Peanut.comment: O tempo eliminou as características do barril e potencializou a base. Chocolate super evidente e saboroso, baunilha e maior sensação de manteiga de amendoim (textura e sabor). Segue com leves notas terrosas e minerais, e dulçor médio alto. Ótima
Barrel Aged ICON Double Chocolate Peanut.translatedComment: Time has eliminated the characteristics of the barrel and enhanced the base. Super evident and tasty chocolate, vanilla and greater sensation of peanut butter (texture and flavor). It continues with light earthy and mineral notes, and medium-high sweetness. Excellent

Mosaic Lover.comment: Até agora das lovers que tomei, a que ficou aquém das outras, no aroma tá bastante maracujá, cítrica e leve herbal. No sabor vem muito dulçor com um leve dank, atrapalhando a drinkability, álcool nulo.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: So far from the lovers I've had, the one that fell short of the others, the aroma is quite passion fruit, citrus and light herbal. The flavor has a lot of sweetness with a slight dank, hindering drinkability, zero alcohol.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Ja tinha tomado ela na versão em lata e curti bastante. Mas no tap estava muito muito melhor.Mais sequinha e com menos dulçor e mais amargor.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: I had already had it in the canned version and really enjoyed it. But on tap it was much much better. Dryer and with less sweetness and more bitterness.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Tá bem gostosa
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: It's very tasty

Mosaic Lover.comment: Aroma bem frutado, puxando mais pra um frutado doce do que cítrico. No paladar tá macia, mas faltou amargor e sobrou dulçor. Acabou ficando meio enjoativa.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Very fruity aroma, more sweet fruity than citrusy. On the palate it is soft, but there is a lack of bitterness and a surplus of sweetness. It ended up getting a little boring.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Boa pacaraio… segue sendo uma das melhores dogma
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Good pacaraio… it continues to be one of the best dogma

Mosaic Lover.comment: Mosaic explodindo mas com baixa formação e retenção de espuma
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Exploding mosaic but with low foam formation and retention

Mosaic Lover.comment: Aroma frutado. Paladar muito abacaxi, melão, laranja lima e leve herbal. Dulcor alto e amargor baixo.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Fruity aroma. Taste very pineapple, melon, lime orange and light herbal. High sweetness and low bitterness.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Nunca foi fã de Single Hop de Mosaic. Particularmente acho ele fraco sozinho. Mas isto daqui está divino..Uma pegada old school e ao Mesmo tempo moderna.Boa dms. Colocou todas as outras single mosaic que já experimentei no chinelo.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Never been a fan of Mosaic Single Hop. Personally, I think he's weak on his own. But this one is divine..An old school feel and at the same time modern.Good dms. It put every other single mosaic I've tried to shame.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Bebendo muitos anos depois. Mantendo a nota pelo saudosismo
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Drinking many years later. Keeping the note for nostalgia

Mosaic Lover.comment: Cerva da virada, sem muita análise só goles para comemorar. Boa breja!! Feliz 2023!!
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: New beer, without much analysis, just sips to celebrate. Good beer!! Happy 2023!!

Mosaic Lover.comment: Checkin antigo
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Old checkin

Mosaic Lover.comment: Das melhores dogma até hoje
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: One of the best dogmas to date

Mosaic Lover.comment: Espetaculo de cerveja. Aroma e amargor deliciosos.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Beer show. Delicious aroma and bitterness.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Delayed
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Delayed

Mosaic Lover.comment: Boa pra aprender sobre os lúpulos total cara do mosaic kkk
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Good for learning about hops, total mosaic dude lol

Mosaic Lover.comment: Maracujosa. Deliciosa
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Passionate. Delicious

Mosaic Lover.comment: De ontem na dogma jardins
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Yesterday's dogma gardens

Mosaic Lover.comment: Muito amarga, com alguma adstringência de uva branca, alguma citricidade
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Very bitter, with some white grape astringency, some citricity

Mosaic Lover.comment: Muito boa
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Very good

Mosaic Lover.comment: Resina, resinoso e resineiro. Até acho que o Mosaic pode entregar mais que isso, mas tava no mês de vencimento, o lúpulo estava cansado. Ok, tinha também um pouco de citricidade. Na boca, muito sedoso, bastante sabor de lúpulo. Amargor médio+. Álcool leve
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Resin, resinous and resinous. I even think that Mosaic could deliver more than that, but it was in the expiration month, the hops were tired. Okay, there was also a little citricity. In the mouth, very silky, plenty of hop flavor. Medium+ bitterness. Light alcohol

Mosaic Lover.comment: Single Hops é o que há. Muita fruta amarela, ótima.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Single Hops is what it is. Lots of yellow fruit, great.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Agosto 2021.Dogma Dogma Dogma Dogma. Sempre será uma das melhores cervejarias do Brasil
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: August 2021.Dogma Dogma Dogma Dogma. It will always be one of the best breweries in Brazil

Mosaic Lover.comment: (LCI)
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: (LCI)

Mosaic Lover.comment: Pior que tá bem boa mesmo com o ano de envase, Mosaicão explodindo!
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Worse still, it's very good even after the year it was bottled, Mosaicão exploding!

Mosaic Lover.comment: Bem abaixo dos últimos lotes, era – com certa folga – a melhor da linha Lover. Não está de todo mal, mas falta. Não entendo a insistência da Dogma nessa validade de 12 meses. Sedimentada, dulçor carregado, leve fermento.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Well below the last batches, it was – by some distance – the best in the Lover line. It's not bad at all, but it's lacking. I don't understand Dogma's insistence on this 12-month validity. Sedimented, full of sweetness, light yeast.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Excelente!
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Great!

Mosaic Lover.comment: Que absurdo na boa. Se não bebeu coloca no whish list !
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: How absurd it is. If you didn't drink it, put it on your wish list!

Mosaic Lover.comment: Prost!!!
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Dumbass!!!

Mosaic Lover.comment: Tomei essa cerveja no dia que o Toledo comemorou que ia ser pai.
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: I had this beer the day Toledo celebrated that he was going to be a father.

Mosaic Lover.comment: Late check-in 19/07/19
Mosaic Lover.translatedComment: Late check-in 19/07/19

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Lekker!!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Tasty!!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: What a Russian imperial stout！The coffee flavor can make you feel you‘re drinking a pint of coffee.It's a bit boozy, but not so sweet. It’s aromatic but it doesn’t make you misunderstand it’s black IPA. What a big bomb! Sit back and relax. Cheers

It’s aromatic but it doesn’t make you misunderstand it’s black IPA. What a big bomb! Sit back and relax. Cheers

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Thick and sweet with strong coffee flavors.  Outstanding.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Thick and sweet with strong coffee flavors.  Outstanding.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: 4.1-4.2，不是我的偏好
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: 4.1-4.2, not my preference

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Prefiro a base. Mas mesmo assim incrível
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: I prefer the base. But still amazing

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Bastante café expresso em um corpo alto, licoroso. Amargor final pronunciado mas sem ser agressivo. Leve aroma de cinzas que desaparece com o aumento da temperatura. Uma excelente coffee Stout.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Plenty of espresso in a tall, liqueur body. Pronounced final bitterness but without being aggressive. Light ash aroma that disappears with increasing temperature. An excellent coffee stout.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: LCI

Not bad 4.35

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: 焦苦感太重
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Too much anxiety

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Uma pancada. Uma perfeição! Potente em tudo, pra tomar de colher! O corpo é um caso a parte!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: A blow. A perfection! Powerful in everything, to take with a spoon! The body is a separate case!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Que
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: What

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Tak urval jsem ještě jeden kousek tohodle zázraku. Na 5 to tentokrát není. Trochu je cítit alkohol a lehká kafová štiplavost. I tak je to ale furt super luxus mega hutnej stout.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: So I grabbed one more piece of this miracle. It's not at 5 this time. There is a bit of alcohol and a slight coffee pungency. Even so, it's still a super luxury mega-dense stout.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Lci. Simplesmente perfeita.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Luci. Simply perfect.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Coffee with used engine oil. Kick ass
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Coffee with used engine oil. Kick ass

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Café
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Café

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Caramba.. Que loucura essa breja!Geralmente, acho disperdicio adc café em Imperial Stout, mas nessa, casou bem demais!O café completa no aroma (além das notas de chocolate amargo), no sabor e até no amargor!Corpo sedoso e uma espuma maravilhosa!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Wow.. How crazy is this beer! Generally, I think coffee is a waste in Imperial Stout, but in this one, it goes really well! The coffee completes in aroma (in addition to the notes of dark chocolate), in flavor and even in bitterness! Silky body and a wonderful foam!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Pesada demais no café. Ficou desequilibrada!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Too heavy on the coffee. It was unbalanced!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: No do hajzlu. Tohle je neuvěřitelný pivo. Motorovej olej na kafi. Total top. Chtěl jsem něco hutnýho a kafovýho a fakt jsem to z těch 10 stoutů v lednici trefil. Super místo, vyznaj se + aktuální nabídka je přímo z Untappd. 2 kilečka za plechovčičku.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: To hell with it. This is an incredible beer. Engine oil for coffee. Total top. I wanted something thick and coffee-like, and I really hit it off the 10 stouts in the fridge. Great place, check it out + the current offer is directly from Untappd. 2 pounds per can.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: 补卡
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Replacement card

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Café na alta, sem dulçor e sem ser enjoativa. Licorosa e espuma persistente. Bela cerveja.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: High coffee, without sweetness and without being cloying. Liqueur and persistent foam. Beautiful beer.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Muito café e aquele corpão licoroso
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Lots of coffee and that liqueur body

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Espetacular!!!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Amazing!!!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Caraiiiii
