/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Very good

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Cafézin
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Cafézin

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Praticamente um licor, tem o push do torrado, leve apimentado e amargo, com peso do malte e alcoólico. Boa!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Practically a liqueur, it has the push of toast, light peppery and bitter, with the weight of malt and alcohol. Good!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Nothing wrong with this. Could be a little sweet for some but it balances out for me with fantastic coffee flavor. For a coffee edition RIS it doesn’t get much better than this. Fantastic beer!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Nothing wrong with this. Could be a little sweet for some but it balances out for me with fantastic coffee flavor. For a coffee edition RIS it doesn’t get much better than this. Fantastic beer!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Veio bem descarbonatada dessa vez
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: It came very decarbonated this time

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Hora de trocar o óleo
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Time to change the oil

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Decepção... 🙁
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Disappointment... 🙁

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Cafezão, delícia. Acho que complementou bem a cerva, senti falta de mais café na Engesa "normal". A Coffee ainda diminui um pouco o dulçor. Ótima cerva.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Coffee, delicious. I think it complemented the beer well, I missed more coffee in "normal" Engesa. Coffee even reduces the sweetness a little. Great beer.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Tomei com meu pai e Anderson na craft. Alcoólica e cafezão! Corpo licoroso. Peguei só um golinho da lata do meu pai.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: I took it with my father and Anderson at craft. Alcohol and coffee! Liqueur body. I just took a sip from my dad's can.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: LCI. Dark roasted cofee beans, brewed coffee, roasted malt, licorice, soy sauce, caramel. Definitely an improvement over the Engesa Oil base version.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: LCI. Dark roasted cofee beans, brewed coffee, roasted malt, licorice, soy sauce, caramel. Definitely an improvement over the Engesa Oil base version.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Torra média, espuma de boa formação e persistência. Cafezão domina do início ao fim, mas sem enjoar. LCI 04/03/2022
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Medium roast, foam with good formation and persistence. Cafezão dominates from start to finish, but without getting boring. LCI 03/04/2022

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Dikke koffiebar.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Great coffee bar.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Caiu muito em comparação aos lotes anteriores! Café ainda aparece legal, mas sem o mesmo destaque de outrora, pois briga com torra e leve esfumaçado. Aliás, virou trabalho hercúleo achar IS acima da média nos últimos tempos!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: It dropped a lot compared to previous batches! Coffee still appears nice, but without the same prominence as before, as it struggles with roasting and a slight smokiness. In fact, it has become a herculean task to find above-average IS in recent times!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Even better second time around. So decadent but moreish
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Even better second time around. So decadent but moreish

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Aroma de café torrado. No paladar mais ainda café torrado, chocolate amargo, torra e leve melaco. Dulcor baixo e amargor alto em uma base extremamente licorosa. Bela breja!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Aroma of roasted coffee. On the palate, even more roasted coffee, dark chocolate, roast and light molasses. Low sweetness and high bitterness in an extremely liqueur base. Beautiful breja!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Café pegou pesado nessa, um tom acima. Mas não atrapalhou o passeio
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Café was heavy on this one, a tone above. But it didn't spoil the trip

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Bom corpo, denso, café domina aroma e sabor, sem exagero, com leve torra e amargor
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Good body, dense, coffee dominates aroma and flavor, without exaggeration, with light roasting and bitterness

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Late check-in 24/10/2020 *
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Late check-in 24/10/2020 *

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Perigosa, desce fácil!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Dangerous, goes down easily!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Uma boa imperial Stout como sempre da Salvador.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: A good imperial Stout as always from Salvador.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Some of the most intense flavours I've ever had off. Stout, pure oily dark chocolate And coffee. Great stuff
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Some of the most intense flavours I've ever had off. Stout, pure oily dark chocolate And coffee. Great stuff

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: 发酸的咖啡液香气，入口偏水，较为干涩的苦味。
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: The aroma of sour coffee liquid, the entrance is watery, and the taste is dry and bitter.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Shiiiit. Silky and thick body. Coffee isn’t lightly roasted but the floral and fruity notes are kept very lively. Best beer I’ve had out of the Southern hemisphere.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Shiiiit. Silky and thick body. Coffee isn’t lightly roasted but the floral and fruity notes are kept very lively. Best beer I’ve had out of the Southern hemisphere.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Late check-in
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Late check-in

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: 咖啡好浓
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: The coffee is so strong

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Batch 305/1 没有之前喝的那么油
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Batch 305/1 is not as oily as the previous drink.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Eu não canso de beber essa maravilha
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: I never get tired of drinking this wonder

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Een straf bakje koffie brouwen kunnen ze in Brazilië wel. Stroperige, donkerbruine emulsie met volle tonen van bittere cacao, geroosterde koffie, nootmuskaat, drop en bruine suiker en de textuur van motorolie. Verrukkelijk!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: They can brew a great cup of coffee in Brazil. Syrupy, dark brown emulsion with full notes of bitter cocoa, roasted coffee, nutmeg, licorice and brown sugar and the texture of motor oil. Delicious!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Een geweldige koffiebom! Maar iets teveel koolzuur. Valt iets tegen.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: A great coffee bomb! But a little too much carbon dioxide. Something is disappointing.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.comment: Pours like engine oil. Big roasty coffee hit, with rich chocolate & liquorice. Cheers Ana Flávia M.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-engesa-oil-coffee.translatedComment: Pours like engine oil. Big roasty coffee hit, with rich chocolate & liquorice. Cheers Ana Flávia M.

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: Maravilhosa!! Chocolate, jerez, toffee, ameixa, fruta passa, damasco, pimenta da jamaica, rapadura, mel, amendoas, casca de uva, amadeirado, baunilha. Licorosa, flat, semi seca, abv totalmente domado. Um deleite sensorial!
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: Wonderful!! Chocolate, sherry, toffee, plum, raisin, apricot, allspice, rapadura, honey, almonds, grape skin, woody, vanilla. Liqueur, flat, semi-dry, completely tamed abv. A sensory delight!

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: De beber com a patroa! Pra mim só faltou a leve acidez, álcool sobrou de leve. Delicia! 🤙🏽🍻
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: Drinking with the boss! For me, the only thing missing was the slight acidity, the alcohol was slightly left over. Delight! 🤙🏽🍻

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: Para tudo! Que Cerveja! Cala a boca e pega o meu dinheiro
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: For everything! What beer! Shut up and take my money

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: Primeira cerveja do MD Wood Aged Club
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: MD Wood Aged Club's first beer

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: Licorosa, acidez equilibrada com dulçor no retrogosto. Nuances de Jerez e Vinho do Porto.
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: Liqueur, balanced acidity with sweetness in the aftertaste. Nuances of Jerez and Port Wine.

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: Complexidade perfeita do barril, dulçor equilibrado, acidez média-baixa, persistência de boca, um absurdo de cerveja.
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: Perfect complexity from the barrel, balanced sweetness, medium-low acidity, persistence in the mouth, an absurd beer.

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: meu SB2019 não foi dos melhores. mas isso aqui ajudou a justificar a viagem.
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: my SB2019 wasn't the best. but this helped justify the trip.

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: Viver para tomar essa obra prima é um privilégio. Valeu mundão 👍
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: Living to take this masterpiece is a privilege. Thanks world 👍

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: Cerveja com cara de vinho licoroso, pesada, aromatica, alcoolica, unica. Um casamento entre Jerez e Barley Wine magico.
/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.translatedComment: Beer with the appearance of liqueur wine, heavy, aromatic, alcoholic, unique. A magical marriage between Jerez and Barley Wine.

/b/mad-dwarf-brewery-md-oloroso-2017/295.comment: Jerez, frutas vermelhas, malte leve, acidez baixa, frutas vermelhas

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.comment: Bem perto do vencimento. Café se foi, maple presente, mas menos intenso... sobrou mto chocolate meio amargo. Absurda cremosidade, leve metálico, álcool dando uma beliscada e dulçor redondinho. Pesadona. Tá de boas.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.translatedComment: Very close to expiration. Coffee is gone, maple is present, but less intense... a lot of dark chocolate is left. Absurd creaminess, light metallic, alcohol giving a hint and round sweetness. Heavy. It's good.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.translatedComment: A creamy and smooth stout with an intense coffee flavor, which is balanced by the sweetness of maple syrup. The mouthfeel is creamy and soft with a slight bitterness that remains in the aftertaste.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.translatedComment: How delicious this is, it had all the elements to be extremely sweet and cloying, but it was quite the opposite, well balanced and very well made.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.comment: Isso sim e uma raridade pra BS que trem gostoso. Pastry equilibrada demais e nao aqueles trem doce que se vê hoje em dia.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.translatedComment: Now that's a rarity for BS, what a delicious train. Too balanced pastry and not the sweet train you see nowadays.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.comment: Te veel koffiebitter. Te zoet en te sticky. Een droge, toch plakkerige afdronk.  En dan tóch hinten van kokos 😱Dit gaat hem niet worden;  té van iets, ongeacht wat, is nooit goed
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.translatedComment: Too much coffee bitters. Too sweet and too sticky. A dry, yet sticky aftertaste. And then there's a hint of coconut 😱 This isn't going to happen; too much of anything, no matter what, is never a good thing

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.comment: Gratidão demais a Gina A. por poder tomar essa breja em pleno 2022, resquícios dos tempos gloriosos das 5E e do próprio contexto Pastry. Isso tá muito bom, Maple com considerável destaque como não mais se vê! Mantendo a nota das anteriores.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-coff.translatedComment: I'm so grateful to Gina A. for being able to take this beer in the middle of 2022, remnants of the glorious times of 5E and the Pastry context itself. This is very good, Maple with considerable prominence like you don't see anymore! Maintaining the previous notes.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Proposta entrega com mérito. Sorvete napolitano real, aroma e paladar idênticos. Baita sobremesa, abv nulo e dulçor na medida.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Proposal for delivery with merit. Real Neapolitan ice cream, identical aroma and taste. Great dessert, zero abv and just enough sweetness.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: 4.60  gosto pouco dela 🥰
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: 4.60 I don't like her 🥰

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Muito interessante. O sorvete Napolitano realmente explode na cara ao abrir a lata. Cerveja densa mas leve; morango, baunilha e chocolate aparecem bem distintos; espuma densa e persistente. Boa cerveja mas um pouco doce demais.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Very interesting. Neapolitan ice cream really explodes in your face when you open the can. Dense but light beer; strawberry, vanilla and chocolate appear very distinct; dense and persistent foam. Good beer but a little too sweet.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Que loucura! O aroma tá igualim um sorvete napolitano mesmo! Em boca a sensação do napolitano continua, mas logo é equilibrada pela torra e amargor. Cerveja cremosa, mas sem ser muito pesadona ou enjoativa. Proposta cumprida com louvor!
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: How crazy! The aroma is just like Neapolitan ice cream! In the mouth the Neapolitan sensation continues, but is soon balanced by roasting and bitterness. Creamy beer, but without being too heavy or cloying. Proposal fulfilled with flying colors!

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Muito saborosa. Parece um sorvete. Aroma lácteo e doce de morango, chocolate e baunilha. Cor preta bem escura, boa carbonatação, boa formação de espuma, duradoura. Amargor baixo. Notas torradas como café. Dulçor final no aftertaste.Corpo alto.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Very tasty. It looks like ice cream. Dairy and sweet aroma of strawberry, chocolate and vanilla. Very dark black color, good carbonation, good foam formation, long lasting. Low bitterness. Roasted notes like coffee. Final sweetness in the aftertaste. Full body.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Uma breja super incorpada,no paladar ela lembra muito o sorvete napolitano.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: A super full-bodied beer, on the palate it is very reminiscent of Neapolitan ice cream.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Aroma mto forte de nalolitano. Coloração preta escura. Na boca é forte o gosto de chocolate e um pouco de café.  O propósito atende totalmente.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Very strong aroma of nalolithane. Dark black coloring. In the mouth there is a strong taste of chocolate and a little coffee. The purpose is fully met.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Talvez seja questão de preferência, mas achei o morango muito artificial e a cerveja em si doce demais

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Now they got it right. Much better than the first batch. 0 defects. Medium roast. Persistent strawberry aroma. Good carbonation. Vanilla and nuts apparent but not cloying.4.35

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Morango, baunilha e chocolate entregues num corpo cremoso e com álcool fantasma. Ridículo.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Strawberry, vanilla and chocolate delivered in a creamy body with ghost alcohol. Ridiculous.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Vou ser sincero… essa foi uma da melhores coisas que já bebi na vida. A proposta teve êxito! Napolitano real…Gosto de infância
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: I'll be honest... this was one of the best things I've ever drunk in my life. The proposal was successful! Real Neapolitan…Childhood taste

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Esticadinho de morango/morangueti no copo
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Strawberry/strawberry stretch in glass

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Aroma de sorvete napolitano. No paladar mais napolitano, chocolate ao leite e baunilha. Dulcor médio e amargor baixo. Cremosidade gigante.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Aroma of Neapolitan ice cream. On the more Neapolitan palate, milk chocolate and vanilla. Medium sweetness and low bitterness. Giant creaminess.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Repeteco, reafirmo que esse lote está indecente e se consagra como uma das melhores Icon (e uma das melhores cervejas já feitas nacionalmente). Napolitano puro. Morango comanda, seguido de chocolate e por fim baunilha. Linda maciez. ABV 👻.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: I repeat, I reaffirm that this batch is indecent and is established as one of the best Icon (and one of the best beers ever made nationally). Pure Neapolitan. Strawberry commands, followed by chocolate and finally vanilla. Beautiful softness. ABV 👻.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Sem comentários
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: No comments

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Me lembrou mais bolo floresta negra que napolitano. De qualquer forma o morango tá bem evidente sem ser intrusivo.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: It reminded me more of black forest cake than Neapolitan. Anyway, the strawberry is very evident without being intrusive.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Mantendo a nota....dessa essência de sorvete napolitano.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Keeping the note....of that essence of Neapolitan ice cream.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: belo sorvete
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: beautiful ice cream

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Chocolate amargo 🍫, sorvete napolitano, baunilha.. Essas foram minhas percepções. Uma sobremesa líquida alcoólica, corpo muito alto, espuma de boa formação e boa retenção, bem cremosa, breja para degustar bem devagar. Usei chocolate na harmonização. Top!
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Dark chocolate 🍫, Neapolitan ice cream, vanilla... These were my perceptions. An alcoholic liquid dessert, very high body, good foam formation and good retention, very creamy, brewed to enjoy very slowly. I used chocolate in the pairing. Top!

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Sorvete napolitano na veia. Equilibrada e dentro do limite de dulcor. Grande.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Neapolitan ice cream in your veins. Balanced and within the sweetness limit. Big.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Excelente breja, corpo alto licoros mas um pouco a mais de morango seria um napolitano perfeito
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Excellent breja, high liqueur body but a little more strawberry would make a perfect Neapolitan

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Chamem de Stikadinho,  sorvete napolitano ou chocolate sensação. Nostalgia rolando geral nessa breja. Não experimentei o primeiro lote dela. Mas essa ficou linda.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Call it Stikadinho, Neapolitan ice cream or chocolate sensation. General nostalgia going on in this swamp. I didn't try her first batch. But this one was beautiful.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Cheiro de chocolate sensação, gosto de sorvete da Kibon.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Smell of chocolate sensation, taste of Kibon ice cream.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Isso tá Bom hein, no Aroma vem forte o Sorvete Napolitano, amargor equilibrado, delícia de RIS.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: That's good, huh, in Aroma the Neapolitan Ice Cream is strong, balanced bitterness, delicious RIS.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Napolitano 100%
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Napolitano 100%

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: porra muita midia! assertiva demais a proposta. morangasso! baunilha veio menos, memlembra aquele chocolate sensacao
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: damn a lot of media! the proposal is too assertive. strawberry! vanilla came less, remember that chocolate sensation

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Reprodução fiel e absoluta de um sorvete napolitano. O aroma é um show à parte. É simplesmente idêntico, só q isso se repete no paladar tb. Morango, baunilha q traz a pegada de sorvete de creme e cacau. Se sente todos. Leve, abv nulo, doce na medida. Wow.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Faithful and absolute reproduction of a Neapolitan ice cream. The aroma is a show in itself. It's simply identical, but this is repeated on the palate as well. Strawberry, vanilla that brings the touch of cream and cocoa ice cream. Sit down everyone. Light, zero abv, just right. Wow.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Outra experiência gastronômica singular.,Misture uma stout com um sorvete, torne isso uma cerveja de excelente corpo e sabor de sorvete napolitano…cerveja para dividir ou beber aos poucos para não ficar enjoativa.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Another unique gastronomic experience. Mix a stout with an ice cream, make it a beer with an excellent body and the flavor of Neapolitan ice cream…beer to share or drink slowly so as not to get sick.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Que cerveja !!!
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: What beer!!!

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: É uma cerveja que precisa de acompanhamento, uma sobremesa que tenha chocolate amargo pode ser uma boa pedida, justamente, pelo dulçor exagerado. Mas é a proposta da cerveja!
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: It's a beer that needs accompaniment, a dessert that contains dark chocolate could be a good choice, precisely because of the exaggerated sweetness. But it's the beer's proposal!

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Um absurdo
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Absurd

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Simplesmente sensacional. O aroma de sorvete napolitano domina tudo ao abrir a lata. Corpo sedoso mas não licoroso. Muita baunilha, chocolate amargo e leve doce.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Simply sensational. The aroma of Neapolitan ice cream dominates everything when you open the can. Silky body but not liqueur. Lots of vanilla, dark chocolate and light sweetness.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Acho que a única Stout que gostei de verdade
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: I think it's the only Stout I really liked

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Chocolate, strawberry, vanilla
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Chocolate, strawberry, vanilla

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Muito, mas muito melhor que o lote primeiro. Napolitano total, tá um absurdo essa réplica, chega a ser indecente. Morango na medida, baunilha, envolto de muito cacau. Macia demais. Menor percepção alcoólica dessa vez, o que até favorece. Sensacional.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Much, much better than the first batch. Totally Neapolitan, this reply is absurd, it's almost indecent. Just the right amount of strawberry, vanilla, covered in lots of cocoa. Too soft. Less alcoholic perception this time, which actually favors it. Sensational.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Está mais seca e com um final torrado que antes não tinha. Confesso que incomodou um pouco, pois achei que tirou o caráter pastry da cerveja. Analisando os últimos lançamentos, acredito que seja um caminho escolhido pela cervejaria.
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: It's drier and has a toasted finish that it didn't have before. I confess that it bothered me a little, as I thought it took away the pastry character of the beer. Analyzing the latest releases, I believe this is a path chosen by the brewery.

/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.comment: Continua boa demais!
/b/spartacus-brewing-icon-neapolitan-ice.translatedComment: Still very good!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Very strong, very tasty. Like a dessert

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: At home it was even better. Sensational foam!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: Cacau torrado com café expresso. Alguma amêndoa no retrogosto. Torra alta trazendo um amargor marcante. RIS raiz, intensa e cremosa. Delicia!!!
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Roasted cocoa with espresso. Some almond in the aftertaste. High roast bringing a marked bitterness. Root RIS, intense and creamy. Delight!!!

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Burnt, coffee, dark bitter chocolate. Nice body, no licorice, kinda velvety

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: Bastante café expresso e cacau torrado envolvidos num corpo e espuma macios do estilo.. Toada roots, sem nhê-nhê-nhê, é o que domina a tônica...
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Plenty of espresso and roasted cocoa wrapped in a soft body and foam of the style... Toada roots, without nhê-nhê-nhê, is what dominates the tonic...

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: Bastante café, mas pouco amargor ou presença dos maltês. Vale o amadeirado do aroma e o equilibro caramelizado do sabor
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Plenty of coffee, but little bitterness or Maltese presence. Worth the woody aroma and the caramelized balance of the flavor

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: Mais torra e menos sensação de chocolate dessa vez. Leve doce de leite no retrogosto.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: More roasting and less chocolate sensation this time. Light dulce de leche in the aftertaste.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: Mais uma que não emocionou tanto quanto da primeira vez. Aqui o café não apareceu tanto e o chocolate tomou conta. A sensação era de estar tomando um nescau
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Another one that wasn't as emotional as the first time. Here coffee didn't appear so much and chocolate took over. It felt like taking a drink

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: Coffee and chocolate! What more could you want?
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Coffee and chocolate! What more could you want?

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: Tudo o que eu esperava... e mais um pouco. Fenômeno de café e cacau
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Everything I expected... and more. Coffee and cocoa phenomenon

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: De cara a torra toma conta, quando ela aquece se equilibra e o chocolate surge de forma intensa se misturando com café harmonicamente, além disso leve notas de amêndoas e um retrogosto delicioso de doce de leite. Lote novo. Intensamente boa.
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: Right away the roasting takes over, when it heats up it balances out and the chocolate appears intensely, mixing harmoniously with coffee, in addition, it has light notes of almonds and a delicious aftertaste of dulce de leche. New lot. Intensely good.

/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.comment: 颜色非常黑，反正是墨汁的感觉，是我喝过颜色上最黑的一款。刚倒出来喝着有点水，有杀口，放一会儿了二氧化碳消散了之后，酒体喝起来非常醇厚，有生巧的味道，这点很惊奇。咖啡，生巧的感觉，酒精感压得也不错。蛮有水准的牌子，力荐
/b/salvador-brewing-co-the-beans/3834457.translatedComment: The color is very dark, it feels like ink anyway, and it is the darkest drink I have ever had. It was a bit watery when I first poured it out, and it tasted a bit salty. After letting it sit for a while and the carbon dioxide dissipated, the wine tasted very mellow and had the taste of making perfect, which was surprising. Coffee, the feeling of making coffee, the alcohol is also suppressed well. A very good brand, highly recommended

/b/cervejaria-dogma-magnum-opus/1973050.comment: Creme médio, mas de ótima retenção e textura. Aroma mescla forte manga com lupulado intenso. Juicy mais na aparência e aroma. Na boca, lupulado intensifica, com resinoso do lúpulo, final especiado e medianamente alcoólico. Ótima duble Neipa.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-magnum-opus/1973050.translatedComment: Medium cream, but with great retention and texture. Aroma mixes strong mango with intense hops. Juicy more in appearance and aroma. In the mouth, hoppy intensifies, with resinous hops, a spicy and moderately alcoholic finish. Great double Neipa.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: 4,65. Quelle claque. Quel équilibre. Sirupeux, profond, torréfié, boisé, café cacao tour ce que tu veux de l'IS mais surtout hyper harmonieux. Ça se sirote certes, mais on est pas écoeuré. Bombe de saveur...
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: 4.65. What a slap. What balance. Syrupy, deep, roasted, woody, coffee cocoa whatever you want from the IS but above all super harmonious. You can certainly sip it, but you won't be nauseated. Flavor bomb...
Happy 4.65

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Mocno wytrawna podstawka, taniczna, drewniana, lekka kawka, no ta beczka mocna wytrawna, czyli oldskulowy stoucik w beczkach po przebiegu, 4,1, s: slodkie, czekoladowe, beczkowe i alkoholowe, tanin sporo, sciaganie i znowu alkohol, jak na oldskul 4,2 over
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: A very dry base, tannic, wooden, light coffee, and this barrel is a strong, dry one, i.e. an old-school stout in barrels after a run, 4.1, s: sweet, chocolatey, barrel-aged and alcoholic, a lot of tannins, astringent and again alcohol, as for old-school 4.2 overs

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Spartacus continues to creat AMAZING stouts with Arete series!A straight forward imperial stout with loads of bourbon, thick body and long lasting aftertaste. Gets too boozy though.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Spartacus continues to creat AMAZING stouts with Arete series!A straight forward imperial stout with loads of bourbon, thick body and long lasting aftertaste. Gets too boozy though.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Alcoholisch en barrel to the max ! Een slok geeft een bitter alcoholische salmiak smaak die over loopt  in een zoetere afdronk met vanille & chocolade tonen. Op kamer temperatuur is alles nog veel zachter en evenwichtiger Echt fantastisch deze ! 4.8
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Alcoholic and barrel to the max! A sip gives a bitter alcoholic sal ammoniac taste that flows into a sweeter aftertaste with vanilla & chocolate notes. At room temperature everything is much softer and more balanced. Really fantastic! 4.8

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Another wonderful beer shared with great friends. Thx again for traveling to Cellar, sharing your beer and your friendship. This one was also incredible. Same great flavors with stronger barrel and booze.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Another wonderful beer shared with great friends. Thx again for traveling to Cellar, sharing your beer and your friendship. This one was also incredible. Same great flavors with stronger barrel and booze.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Bbt21 material.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Bbt21 material.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Delicious dark chocolate
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Delicious dark chocolate

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Is dit perfectie, ja bijna wel. Het is in elk geval porno in een fles! Verschillende laagjes met o.a. vanille en choco....fluweel zacht, scherp randje van de barrel en pepertje in de afdronk....echt wauw. 🇧🇷Ja ik doe het dan maar.....een 5!! Topper.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Is this perfection, yes almost. In any case, it's porn in a bottle! Various layers including vanilla and chocolate...velvet soft, sharp edge of the barrel and pepper in the aftertaste...really wow. 🇧🇷Yes, I'll do it then.....a 5!! Topper.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Esqueci da foto. Cerveja do Tri da libertadores. ◼️🟥 ... Forte candidata a melhor do ano de 2022!
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: I forgot the photo. Beer from Tri da Libertadores. ◼️🟥 ... Strong candidate for best of the year 2022!

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: De AT 2 was ruk, maar de 1, 3 en ook weer deze 4 van absoluut topniveau. Porno in een flesje dus weer van de Braziliaanse mannen van Spartacus Brewing. Dik, silky, veel laagjes, veel barrel en zoet (op een prettige manier) Fenomenaal! 🤤🤤🤤
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: The AT 2 was a blast, but the 1, 3 and again this 4 were of absolute top quality. Porn in a bottle again from the Brazilian men of Spartacus Brewing. Thick, silky, lots of layers, lots of barrel and sweet (in a pleasant way) Phenomenal! 🤤🤤🤤

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Wat een absolute knaller. Het is weer een 5. Een enorme bak pure chocolade, gebrande mouten, vanille en wat koffie. Een licht pepertje maalt de balans compleet. En dan volgt nog het lichtzoute dropje in de afdronk. Gewedig!!
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: What an absolute blast. It's another 5. A huge bowl of dark chocolate, roasted malts, vanilla and some coffee. A light touch of pepper completes the balance. And then comes the slightly salty licorice in the aftertaste. Awesome!!

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Tomo madness. Op Heaven Hill en Weller vaten gelegen. Dat kan niet verkeerd gaan. En dat is het natuurlijk ook niet gegaan. Ook de vierde Tomo is weer geweldig. Man man man.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Tomo madness. Located on Heaven Hill and Weller barrels. That can't go wrong. And of course that didn't work out. The fourth Tomo is also great again. Man man man.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Met de overwinning van groningen op psv smaakt ie nog beter!! 🥳🥳💚💚🤪🤪
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: With Groningen's victory over PSV it tastes even better!! 🥳🥳💚💚🤪🤪

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Mega wanilina w zapachu + lekki kokos, lody czekoladowe, irysy. W smaku podobnie, intensywne, dość słodkie, z nutą słonego karmelu i mocnego espresso. Średnia, palona goryczka w kontrze, burbonowy, rozgrzewający finisz, gęste, lepkie i treściwe. 4.7
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Mega vanillin + light coconut, chocolate ice cream, irises. The taste is similar, intense, quite sweet, with a hint of salty caramel and strong espresso. Medium, roasted bitterness in the counter, bourbon, warming finish, thick, sticky and full-bodied. 4.7

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Dulçor equilibrado. Acho q guardar mais só tem a melhorar. Baunilha ainda destaca. Mas muito boa meu Deus
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Balanced sweetness. I think saving more only makes things better. Vanilla still stands out. But very good, my God

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: C'est pâteux épais gourmand liquoreux sur la texture quasi parfaite. Bonne surprise, le bourbon explose au nez et s'étale en bouche. C'est gras mais très équilibré, longueur de fou et finale bourbon.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: It's pasty, thick, sweet and sweet with an almost perfect texture. Pleasant surprise, the bourbon explodes on the nose and spreads out on the palate. It's fatty but very balanced, crazy length and bourbon finish.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Tjock, rund och fyllig. Ljuvliga smaker av choklad. Krämig. Väl dold ABV. Alldeles fantastisk . . .
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Thick, round and full. Delicious flavors of chocolate. Creamy. Well hidden ABV. Absolutely fantastic. . .

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: De nummer 4 is net iets beter!
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Number 4 is just a little better!

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Alcool superior e muita castanha
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Superior alcohol and lots of nuts

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Oula. Le nez ressemble à une pâte à tartiner. C'est a fond sur le chocolat, les fruits à coque. Bien vanillée. Le bourbon chauffe en fin de bouche, tout en apportant ses saveurs. C'est ultra gourmand. Hype méritée.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Oula. The nose resembles a spread. It's all about chocolate and nuts. Very vanilla. The bourbon heats up at the end of the mouth, while bringing its flavors. It's ultra delicious. Deserved hype.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: What a fuc*** BA Stout ! At the level of BBT !
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: What a fuc*** BA Stout ! At the level of BBT !

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Non mais c'est la meilleure IS ever! Que dire d'autres ! Merci Mat ! C'est une méga tuerie à découvrir un jour.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: No but it's the best IS ever! What else can I say! Thanks Matt! It's a mega-kill to discover one day.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Jaaaa!! Knaller dit!  Dikke chocolade vanille.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Yay!! This is a blast! Thick chocolate vanilla.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Burnt sugar, pleasant bourbon in the aroma. Syrupy mouthfeel, sweet and nonexistent bitterness. Dark syrupy, burnt sugary flavor with pleasant vanilla bourbon. Very successful barrel effort without excessive sweetness. Very tasty, 4.3.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Burnt sugar, pleasant bourbon in the aroma. Syrupy mouthfeel, sweet and nonexistent bitterness. Dark syrupy, burnt sugary flavor with pleasant vanilla bourbon. Very successful barrel effort without excessive sweetness. Very tasty, 4.3.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Riktigt bra bourbonfatton.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Really good bourbon cask.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Lite vass annars riktigt bra
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: A little sharp otherwise really good

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Big barrel time. Chocolate brownie batter, vanilla notes, sweet and thick but not too much, very good balance between malts and barrel, bitterness is here to push forward the length on palate. Love it. Master class !
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Big barrel time. Chocolate brownie batter, vanilla notes, sweet and thick but not too much, very good balance between malts and barrel, bitterness is here to push forward the length on palate. Love it. Master class !

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Damn, dit blijven toch echt buitencategorie bieren van Spartacus. Net op tijd gespot bij Ido, laatste bij Beerdome gekocht schat ik 🤤
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Damn, these remain truly exceptional beers from Spartacus. Spotted just in time at Ido, last bought at Beerdome I think 🤤

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Dit is echt enorm goed. Al 1 dag open, maar zo zacht, dik, siroperig, vanille, flinke subtiele bourbon
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: This is really very good. Already open for 1 day, but so soft, thick, syrupy, vanilla, big subtle bourbon

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Was maar beetje, en hij stond al even open. Maar daar merk je weinig van! Heerlijk zacht dik spul. Mooie chocolade en koffie. De vanille uit de bourbon is subtiel maar zeker aanwezig.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Just a little, and it was open for a while. But you hardly notice it! Lovely soft thick stuff. Beautiful chocolate and coffee. The vanilla from the bourbon is subtle but definitely present.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Boterzacht van smaak, heel veel bourbon, zoethout en bourbon. Bourbon in het kwadraat. De smaak blijft heerlijk hangen en zo sterk van smaak. Bourbon zaligheid. Heel dik van smaak.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Buttery soft in taste, lots of bourbon, licorice and bourbon. Bourbon squared. The taste lingers wonderfully and is so strong. Bourbon bliss. Very thick in taste.

/b/spartacus-brewing-gun-of-a-son/383063.comment: (LCI) Gostei mais da irmã dela, a Son of a Gun. Nessa aqui o amargor é mais acentuado e o final é bem mais seco. No aroma aparece lichia pra dividir espaço com a uva verde. Muito bom!

/b/spartacus-brewing-gun-of-a-son/383063.comment: Lang uitgekeken naar deze. Na de vorige Spartacus heb ik ze hoog zitten, en deze is in alles net een tikje heftiger. De conclusie: ik denk dat ik liever double dan triple heb bij NEIPAs, maar de romig- en kruidigheid is heerlijk.
/b/spartacus-brewing-gun-of-a-son/383063.translatedComment: Been looking forward to this one for a long time. After the previous Spartacus I had them in high regard, and this one is just a bit more intense in everything. The conclusion: I think I prefer double over triple at NEIPAs, but the creaminess and spiciness are delicious.

/b/spartacus-brewing-gun-of-a-son/383063.translatedComment: Breja about to win, and yet it still has a beautiful freshness! Aroma with lots of green grape, lime, mango and pine. /b/spartacus-brewing-the-script/4192848.comment: Hazy, dik, hoppig, romig, zacht, klein bittertje en heel fruitig. De balans is fenomenaal en de 11% abv zit goed verborgen. Een enorme smaak en geur explosie, een ongelooflijk zacht mondgevoel en een volle smaakbeleving. Veel beter dan dit wordt het niet!
/b/spartacus-brewing-the-script/4192848.translatedComment: Hazy, thick, hoppy, creamy, soft, slightly bitter and very fruity. The balance is phenomenal and the 11% abv is well hidden. An enormous taste and smell explosion, an incredibly soft mouthfeel and a full taste experience. It doesn't get much better than this!

/b/spartacus-brewing-the-script/4192848.comment: Vakantieklapper #10/12. Topperrrtje. Juicy en vol. Beetje gistig, maar heel friszacht. Geurt bloemig, bijna rozen-achtig. Dan veel citrus, beetje gistje en knalt lekker lang door met een trap voor je kanis na.
/b/spartacus-brewing-the-script/4192848.translatedComment: Holiday hit #10/12. Topperrrtje. Juicy and full. A bit yeasty, but very fresh. Smells floral, almost rose-like. Then a lot of citrus, a little yeast and it goes on for a nice long time with a kick for your chance afterward.

/b/spartacus-brewing-the-script/4192848.comment: Hoe beter de vakantie in te luiden, dan met zo’n sappige, volle triple NEIPA uit Brazilië? Witte druif, citrus, perzik, passievrucht, zacht hopbitter en behoorlijk wat koolzuur. ‘Tis weer een fraaie! Muito obrigada Thom B.

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: Revisiting and maintaining the Rating, in this batch, Dulçor was a little higher for me, but it is still very good.

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Que isso, que punch! Sabor de frutas tropicais com dank e herbal explodindo. Pegada de menta e algum bubblegum, finaliza com amargor persistente. Harmonizada demais!
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: What a punch! Tropical fruit flavor with dank and herbal bursting. With a hint of mint and some bubblegum, it finishes with persistent bitterness. Too harmonized!

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Essa breja já tomei várias e várias latas, e sempre repito. ela é muito agradável e equilibrada, um teor alcóolico alto mas que não parece, além do punch de lupulo no aroma e sabor
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: I've already had several cans of this beer, and I always repeat it. it is very pleasant and balanced, a high alcoholic content but it doesn't seem like it, in addition to the hop punch in the aroma and flavor.

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Saladona de frutas cítricas. Macia, equilibrada, dulçor médio. Muito boa
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: Citrus fruit salad. Soft, balanced, medium sweetness. Very good

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: L2-S133.2023.Sem dúvida uma das melhores single hop de Citra do Brasil.
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: L2-S133.2023. Without a doubt one of Citra's best single hops in Brazil.

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Норм сцытры навалили и аромат клевый!
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: They piled up quite a lot of styras and the aroma is cool!

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Aroma frutado. No paladar muito melão, pêssego, lichia, abacaxi e leve herbal. Dulcor baixo e amargor médio equilibrados em uma base super sedosa.
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: Fruity aroma. On the palate lots of melon, peach, lychee, pineapple and light herbal. Low sweetness and medium bitterness balanced in a super silky base.

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Primeira courage que eu tomei demorou 2 semanas pra chegar aqui no RS, agora tomando essa fresquinha deu uma diferença absurda. Melhor single hop de citra que eu já tomei, mas fico na dúvida entre a og e a hoplite só...bem q podiam lançar lote das duas kk
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: The first courage I took took 2 weeks to arrive here in RS, now taking it fresh made an absurd difference. Best citra single hop I've ever had, but I'm in doubt between the og and the hoplite... well they could release a batch of both haha

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: 4,50 srm medo.. Cítrica. Lupulada... Laranja e limão.. Abacaxi e tudo oq temos direito..Parabéns @spartacusbrewing
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: 4.50 srm afraid.. Citrus. Hoppy... Orange and lemon.. Pineapple and everything we're entitled to.. Congratulations @spartacusbrewing

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Citra no talo! Lima, limão, laranja e abacaxi. Saturação explodindo de lúpulo igual aos outros lotes, mas nesse peguei um harshzinho chato. Ainda assim continua o melhor SH de Citra do Brasil.
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: Citra on the stalk! Lime, lemon, orange and pineapple. Exploding saturation of hops like the other batches, but in this one I got a little annoying harshness. Still, it remains the best Citra SH in Brazil.

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: como já era de se esperar. incrível!!!!
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: as was to be expected. incredible!!!!

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Uns 15 dias depois e parece que ela melhorou um pouco. Harsh bem menos evidente assim como o álcool que estava incomodando pouco aparece.
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: About 15 days later and it seems like she has improved a little. Harsh is much less evident, as the alcohol that was bothering him appears little.

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: O conjunto é pornográfico. No entanto, quando gelada, o álcool belisca bastante. Quando esquenta, melhora muito. Um pouco de sedimento na lata também (venc. 10/23). Não fosse isso, gabaritava.
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: The set is pornographic. However, when cold, the alcohol bites a lot. When it warms up, it improves a lot. A little sediment in the can too (expiration 10/23). If it weren't for that, I'd be bragging.

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Belíssima cerveja, corpo macio, sedutor, suculenta, herbal, gramínea, frutado cítrico, laranja lima, dank, ótima para alegar a noite!

/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.comment: Harsh forte, álcool muito presente. Algo não está legal nela.
/b/spartacus-brewing-courage/4301761.translatedComment: Strong harmh, very present alcohol. Something isn't right about her.

/b/cervejaria-bold-brewing-coffee-maple-.translatedComment: Medium high body, medium carbonation, slightly brown foam. Maple flavor evident in the mouth and a striking coffee aftertaste. Pfta for the cold

/b/cervejaria-bold-brewing-coffee-maple-.comment: Fantastic! In a land of light and pale beer, this is dark, think, and rich. The coffee isn't overpowering and the maple comes through nicely

/b/cervejaria-bold-brewing-coffee-maple-.translatedComment: A: very fragrant, maple, wood and coffee! P: It starts very sweet and oily, ends a little more toasted and bitter. Dense and complex. Chewie. Great!

/b/cervejaria-bold-brewing-coffee-maple-.translatedComment: Aroma similar to painted wood (maple) with a similar flavor and notes of vanilla with a little chocolate

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Smaak explosie!!! Super lekker
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Flavor explosion!!! delicious

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Erg lekker (Laura) ☀️🇧🇷
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Very tasty (Laura) ☀️🇧🇷

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Muito boa
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Very good

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Кокосик, маракуйя, хороший кисляк
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Coconut, passion fruit, good sour

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Impressionante essa cerveja ter 10% e ao mesmo tempo passar toda essa frutosidade com delicadeza.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: It's impressive that this beer has 10% and at the same time conveys all this fruitiness with delicacy.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Explosão de goiaba e maracujá
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Guava and passion fruit explosion

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Demorei pra tomar apesar de só ter ouvido falar bem. E estava a altura do que eu ouvi. Álcool não aparece, o frutado contrapõe o azedo deixando ela levemente adocicada. No sabor o mais marcante é o maracujá e o coco. Deliciosa.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: It took me a while to take it despite having only heard good things about it. And it matched what I heard. Alcohol does not appear, the fruitiness counteracts the sourness, leaving it slightly sweet. The most striking flavor is passion fruit and coconut. Delicious.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Muito boa
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Very good

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Consigo sentir o maracujá bem presente e no fundo do paladar a goiaba. Mas o coco e a baunilha se perderam. Mais eu adoro uma sour
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: I can feel the passion fruit very present and guava in the back of the palate. But the coconut and vanilla were lost. But I love a sour

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Nota 4,25. Dentro do estilo brasileiro de cerveja, nota 4,75!
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Rating 4.25. Within the Brazilian style of beer, rating 4.75!

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Muito saborosa , cítrica, o maracujá é predominante mas também da pra sentir bem a goiaba e a baunilha.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Very tasty, citrusy, passion fruit is predominant but you can also smell the guava and vanilla.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Mais um ótimo lote
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Another great batch

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Que cerveja ! Muito boa !!!
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: What beer! Very good!!!

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Bem gostosinha!! Baixa acidez, bom corpo, aroma adocicado, esperava mais goiaba, tem mais maracuja e baunilha com um final que lembra iogurte assim como outras desta serie. Bela sobremesa
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Very tasty!! Low acidity, good body, sweet aroma, I expected more guava, it has more passion fruit and vanilla with a finish reminiscent of yogurt, just like others in this series. Beautiful dessert

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Cerveja muito boa. Porém o sabor do maracujá mata todos os outros aromas e sabores. Se a ideia fosse somente o maracujá seria excelente, mas é uma boa cerveja
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Very good beer. However, the passion fruit flavor kills all other aromas and flavors. If the idea was just passion fruit it would be excellent, but it's a good beer

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: ABV 10% 👻. Muito boa para uma imperial, mas como sempre na minha opinião, cervejas com maracujá a fruta sobressai demais, só sinto gosto e cheiro dele, deveriam saber dosar melhor.Mesmo assim, uma boa breja.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: ABV 10% 👻. Very good for an imperial, but as always in my opinion, in beers with passion fruit the fruit stands out too much, I only taste and smell it, they should know how to dose it better. Still, a good beer.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Guava, Passionfruit, Coconut and Vanilla …from Brazil
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Guava, Passionfruit, Coconut and Vanilla …from Brazil

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Maracujá e goiaba marcam presença mas é o Coco quem domina, sabor remete ao ao manjar de sobremesa, breja adocicada e com acidez moderada.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Passion fruit and guava are present but it is Coco that dominates, the flavor is reminiscent of dessert delicacy, sweet breja with moderate acidity.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: De cacao was waarschijnlijk naar beneden gedwarreld waardoor die nu miste. Dit is echt een vat wat je een paar keer goed op en neer moet bewegen zodat t goed gemixed is. Nog steeds heerlijke vruchten wn vanille, maar de cacao miste.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: The cocoa had probably fluttered down and was now missing. This is really a barrel that you have to move up and down a few times so that it is well mixed. Still delicious fruits and vanilla, but the cocoa was missing.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Primeira vez no tap. Que breja.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: First time on tap. What a bore.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Lekker zuur bier, veel smaken en de kokos komt er mooi door 🍻
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Nice sour beer, lots of flavors and the coconut comes through nicely 🍻

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: A melhor da serie Ephemeral
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: The best of the Ephemeral series

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: It's so cool that I don't know what to do.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Lots of passion fruit, some crisp apricot, ripe apples also? Sweet-ish, moderate sourness. Nice balance from the slight coconut and vanilla. ABV blends in dangerously well. Nice one.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Tradebaas Advent #11 - delicious coconut sour. It's been a long time since I had a thin sour (after all, it is often a smoothie) that was so tasty.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Coconut comes over nicely. Properly acidic, hints of vanilla.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: precies wat de beschrijving zegt. eerst een lekker licht aggresief zuurtje, dan een zoetje van de lactose. Dan de guava en passievrucht. Gevolgd door de kokosnoot met een super vanillesmaak. Dat laatste brengt deze al goede sour naar een ander niveau.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: exactly what the description says. first a nice slightly aggressive sourness, then a sweetness from the lactose. Then the guava and passion fruit. Followed by the coconut with a super vanilla flavor. The latter takes this already good sour to another level.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: L8
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: L8

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Tropical, fruity, some sweetness, guava, rather smooth (warming up for Uppsala International Short Film Festival) (3,75-)
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Tropical, fruity, some sweetness, guava, rather smooth (warming up for Uppsala International Short Film Festival) (3,75-)

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Excellent!
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Excellent!

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Like a vinegar-soaked bounty wrung out over flowers
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Like a vinegar-soaked bounty wrung out over flowers

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Chris’ gezicht spreekt boekdelen. Door mijn vorige ervaring met zuur bier was ik huiverig, maar de afdronk is geweldig!
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Chris' face speaks volumes. My previous experience with sour beer made me hesitant, but the aftertaste is great!

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Zooooooooooo koleertjes. Je moet van een zuurtje en van passievrucht houden maar dan.. maar dan.. 💯
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Soooooooooooo cool. You have to like a sour and passion fruit but then.. but then.. 💯

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Perfect zuur licht zoet fruitigheid, lichte bitter en iets tangy
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Perfectly sour, slightly sweet, fruity, slightly bitter and slightly tangy

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Passievrucht, punica! Tart. Heeft wat Fou Foune vibes. Prettig sapje, maar geen wow
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Passion fruit, punica! Tart. Has some Fou Foune vibes. Nice juice, but no wow

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: LCI - kokos doet denken aan groene curry. Dit is echt fenomenaal! Heurlijk!
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: LCI - coconut is reminiscent of green curry. This is truly phenomenal! Wonderful!

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Deze was erg goed. Zeer fruitig. Zuur is normaal niet mijn ding, maar deze vond ik zelfs goed
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: This one was very good. Very fruity. Sours aren't normally my thing, but I actually liked this one

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Lichtzure passievrucht kokos unit die zo overrated was dat ik hem een jaar in de koelkast heb genegeerd.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Slightly sour passion fruit coconut unit that was so overrated that I ignored it in the refrigerator for a year.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Проста кислота,  але смачно
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Simple acid, but delicious

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Eilinen hedelmäinen ja kirpsakka yömyssy.
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Yesterday's fruity and crisp nightcap.

/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.comment: Fijn, veel passievrucht en guave, met subtiele kokos en vanille. Voor mij is de balans tussen zuur en zoet een beetje zoek in deze: Het zoetje in de afdronk past niet helemaal bij het bittere zuur in het begin. Maar het lekker fruitige maakt dit goed!
/b/cervejaria-dadiva-ephemeral-goiaba-ma.translatedComment: Fine, lots of passion fruit and guava, with subtle coconut and vanilla. For me, the balance between sour and sweet is a bit lost in this one: The sweetness in the aftertaste doesn't quite match the bitter acid in the beginning. But the delicious fruitiness makes up for this!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Incrível
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Incredible

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Uma das melhores que tomei esse ano. Base sedosa, muito frutado, predominância de uva.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: One of the best I've had this year. Silky base, very fruity, predominantly grape.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Fazia tempo q não tomava uma tarin tão boa. NãoMudou nada na receita
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: It's been a while since I've had such a good tarin. Nothing changed in the recipe

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Aroma frutado. No paladar muita laranja lima, uvas, lichia, maracujá, mamão e herbal. Dulcor baixo e amargor medio equilibrados em uma base super sedosa.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Fruity aroma. On the palate lots of lime orange, grapes, lychee, passion fruit, papaya and herbs. Low sweetness and medium bitterness balanced in a super silky base.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Achei fOda.. Me incomodou o harsh..... Mas os sabores são extremos... Equilíbribada e macia..

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Porrada gostosa!!! Lúpulagem extrema, corpo macio, perfume de lichia, algo de maçã verde ao abrir. Na boca mais lichia, uvas brancas. Leve escape de alcool mas dentro do estilo.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Hot shit!!! Extreme hops, soft body, lychee scent, something of green apple when opening. In the mouth more lychee, white grapes. Light alcohol exhaust but within style.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Novo lote, diferente do primeiro sim, mas mantenho a nota. Saturação de lúpulo no mesmo nível, amargor mais redondo, deixando mais fácil de beber, embora impressione menos que antes. Perfil frutado excelente. Fez bonito na comparação com TH.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: New batch, different from the first, yes, but I keep the note. Hop saturation at the same level, rounder bitterness, making it easier to drink, although less impressive than before. Excellent fruity profile. It did well in comparison to TH.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: This brewery is quickly becoming one of my favourites in Brazil. Next time I'm here, I definitely want to check out their brewery! :)

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Muito turva, gosto. Espuma cremosa e retenção 100%. Aroma com lichia, uva verde e um gramíneo que me agradou demais. Sucão de lúpulo, macia até dizer chega, finalzin seco e aftertaste duradouro. 8,6% ABV? Nem vi. Linda demais. Perfeita! (LCI / B1)
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Very cloudy, I like it. Creamy foam and 100% retention. Aroma with lychee, green grape and a grassy note that I really liked. Hop juice, soft to the point, dry finish and long-lasting aftertaste. 8.6% ABV? I didn't even see it. So beautiful. Perfect! (LCI/B1)

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: 4.40. tá mto boa, belíssima, super equilibrada, delícia. Tarin está excelente. Bem aveludada.  Bastante uvas brancas . Deliciosa.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: 4.40. It’s very good, beautiful, super balanced, delicious. Tarin is excellent. Very velvety. Lots of white grapes. Delicious.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Das melhores latas que tomei desse b2, reproduziu a excelência do b1 mesmo próxima da validade. Festival de Nelson. Muita uva verde, carambola, abacaxi, gramíneo. Maciez exemplar!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Of the best cans I've had of this b2, it reproduced the excellence of the b1 even when it was close to its expiration date. Nelson Festival. Lots of green grapes, star fruit, pineapple, grass. Exemplary softness!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Excellent drinkability. Very delicious and well prepared!!!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Última lata. Continua acima da média, porém não marcou igual ao B1. Muita uva verde, lichia, com um pouco de limão. Sedosa, gramínea e herbal mais presente desta vez.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Last can. It remains above average, but it did not score the same as B1. Lots of green grapes, lychee, with a little lemon. Silky, grassy and herbal more present this time.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Boa...mais p juicy

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Acho q não dei sorte, gosto tava meio amanteigado.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: I don't think I was lucky, it tasted a bit buttery.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Como dizia a Tina Turner: simply the best!! Minha primeira nota 5, que isto Tiago!👏👏👏👏👏👏
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: As Tina Turner said: simply the best!! My first rating 5, that's it Tiago!👏👏👏👏👏👏

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Gostei mais da arara. Mas o corpo e a sedosidade realmente impressionam. Tarin chegou pra ficar. Parabéns 🎉 lichia linda
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: I liked the macaw more. But the body and silkiness are really impressive. Tarin is here to stay. Congratulations 🎉 beautiful lychee

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Amarelo e juicy. Aroma: lichia, goiaba branca, uva verde, manga e leve cebola. Corpo médio e aveludada. Sabor: lichia, manga, laranja lima, coco, amargor herbáceo picante, álcool invisível. Final seco, retrogosto frutado amargo. Delicada e saborosa!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Yellow and juicy. Aroma: lychee, white guava, green grape, mango and light onion. Medium body and velvety. Flavor: lychee, mango, lime orange, coconut, spicy herbaceous bitterness, invisible alcohol. Dry finish, bitter fruity aftertaste. Delicate and tasty!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Lovely freshness. Totally fruity, floral. Slightly dank. Mango, papaya. Lychee, green grapes. A full juicy/peachy base. Delicately sweet, indeed totally balanced. Tiny vegetal bitterness. Smooth, creamy/pillowy mouthfeel. Silky and soft. Outstanding. Big.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Lovely freshness. Totally fruity, floral. Slightly dank. Mango, papaya. Lychee, green grapes. A full juicy/peachy base. Delicately sweet, indeed totally balanced. Tiny vegetal bitterness. Smooth, creamy/pillowy mouthfeel. Silky and soft. Outstanding. Big.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Concordo com o Francisco M., esse lote foi loteria, uma pena. Tomei 04 e o perfil variou muito. Duas impecáveis, uma ruim e agora essa linda, mas abaixo do nível. Tá bem gostosa, mas aroma puxando muito pano de chão molhado é certamente broxante, aquém...
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: I agree with Francisco M., this lot was a lottery, a shame. I took 04 and the profile varied a lot. Two impeccable, one bad and now this beautiful one, but below standard. It's very tasty, but the aroma of a lot of wet floor cloth is certainly annoying, not enough...

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: B1 was way better but still pretty good
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: B1 was way better but still pretty good

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Outra cerveja depois de 4 semanas. Não sei se evoluiu ou se a primeira estava zuada. Agora sim uma explosão de uva verde, lichia, pêra! Herbal, pinho, leve dank. Abv 👻, drink nas alturas. Muito boa! Foda é comprar três pra pegar uma boa! Kkkk
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Another beer after 4 weeks. I don't know if it evolved or if the first one was messed up. Now an explosion of green grapes, lychee and pear! Herbal, pine, mild dank. Abv 👻, drink on high. Very good! It's a shame to buy three to get one good one! Hahahaha

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: B2. Ainda boa, mas pior que o b1.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: B2. Still good, but worse than the b1.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Juicy, grapes, lychee
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Juicy, grapes, lychee

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Baita cerveja! Nunca tinha sentido lichia com tanta clareza e intensidade como nesta cerveja. Falo mais dela no meu Instagram @mateus_vidigal_
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Great beer! I had never felt lychee with such clarity and intensity as in this beer. I talk more about her on my Instagram @mateus_vidigal_

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Mantendo o nível do #1 que pra mim foi a melhor Double NE de 2020, o #2 continua lindo. Frutas amarelas, principalmente maracujá e manga, leve resinoso e herbal. Mouthfeel aveludado, corpo denso mas sem cansar e amargor na medida com zero harsh.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Maintaining the level of #1, which for me was the best Double NE of 2020, #2 is still beautiful. Yellow fruits, mainly passion fruit and mango, light resinous and herbal. Velvety mouthfeel, dense but not tiring body and just the right amount of bitterness with zero harshness.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Batch 02. Não emocionou como o primeiro, mesmo assim uma excelente cerveja.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Batch 02. It wasn't as exciting as the first one, but still an excellent beer.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Bebi depois de beber "a orla". Achei as duas "redondas", totalmente balanceadas, e essa aqui com mais corpo do que "a orla". Essas cervejas da Tarin não deixam nenhum incomodo na boca, é uma coisa impressionante.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: I drank it after drinking "the edge". I found both "round", totally balanced, and this one with more body than "the edge". These Tarin beers leave no discomfort in your mouth, it's impressive.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Bastante fruta branca (me parece lichia) e uma sensação de boca bem legal. No sabor achei menos intensa que no aroma.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Lots of white fruit (it looks like lychee to me) and a really nice mouthfeel. In terms of flavor, I found it less intense than in aroma.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: [SVb2] Pegada muito parecida com a b1 só que menos aromática e menos punch. Seria um 4,4 hoje.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: [SVb2] Very similar feel to b1, but less aromatic and less punch. It would be a 4.4 today.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: A expectativa era bem alta e ainda assim fui surpreendido. Uvas brancas, lichia, um toque de resina, mouthfeel fantástico, suculência, equilíbrio e personalidade. Belíssima cerveja.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Expectations were very high and I was still surprised. White grapes, lychee, a touch of resin, fantastic mouthfeel, juiciness, balance and personality. Beautiful beer.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Lote 2

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Após três semanas, o frescor deu uma caída, como de praxe para o estilo. Mas mesmo assim continua interessante.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: After three weeks, the freshness took a nosedive, as is typical for the style. But it remains interesting nonetheless.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Muito muito boa. Corpo, drinkability, amargor, tudo ótimo aqui. Na comparação com a Arara, essa está um pouco abaixo pro meu gosto.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: Very very good. Body, drinkability, bitterness, everything is great here. Compared to the Arara, this one is a little lower for my taste.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: Não vou mentir, já é meu 6º check-in, mas essa lata em específico estava bem abaixo do nível de qualidade. Flat, leve cebola, MF aquoso. Ainda com aquela bomba de uva verde, mas não dá para disfarçar o descontentamento com o nível abaixo.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: I'm not going to lie, this is my 6th check-in, but this specific can was well below the quality level. Flat, light onion, watery MF. Still with that sour grape bomb, but it's not possible to disguise the discontent with the level below.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.comment: caiu em relação ao b1, flat, sem nota
/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: fell in relation to b1, flat, no grade

/b/tarin-cervejaria-sempre-viva/3925482.translatedComment: The first batch was better, but it's still great.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Ahhh, há quanto tempo não tomava uma excelente cerveja; e que beleza que ela ficou no copo... Saúde!! 🍻
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: Ahhh, how long has it been since I had an excellent beer; and how beautiful it looked in the glass... Cheers!! 🍻

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: O primeiro copo estava um pouco amargo, mas depois que fui completando ela ficou muito amarga, já aconteceu isso com outras cervejas mas essa tava impossível de tomar!E sou fã de Everbrew !
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: The first glass was a little bitter, but after I finished it it became very bitter, this has happened with other beers but this one was impossible to drink! And I'm a fan of Everbrew!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Uma IPA que eu gostei. Não é tão amarga quando está bem gelada e harmoniza bem com alguns hambúrgueres.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: An IPA that I liked. It's not so bitter when it's cold and goes well with some burgers.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Esse lote deixou a desejar 😐
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: This batch left something to be desired 😐

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Provando essa finalmente
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: Trying it finally

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Aroma sensacional mas não acompanha no sabor
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: Sensational aroma but doesn't match the flavor

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Primeira semana de curso já foi!
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: First week of the course is over!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Uma das melhores juicy que já provei
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: One of the best juices I've ever tasted

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Вся сочность бразильских фруктов в одном бокале. Маракуйя, манго, ананас. Немного болгарского перца даже. Чуть сладко, за это минус. Всегда интересно, приставку juicy дают когда сами переборщили со сладостью или еще до того, как варить начали.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: All the juiciness of Brazilian fruits in one glass. Passion fruit, mango, pineapple. Even a little bell pepper. A little sweet, that's a minus. It’s always interesting, they give the prefix juicy when they themselves have gone too far with sweetness or even before they start cooking.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Essa é o nectar
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: This is the nectar

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Uma cerveja excepcional, saborosa, equilibrada, preço muito salgado, mas na entrega traz muita qualidade. Na aparência é hazy, amarro forte, viva, formação de espuma impecável. Muito boa, top demais!Hail to the King! 🙌🏻 👑
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: An exceptional beer, tasty, balanced, very expensive, but with delivery it brings a lot of quality. In appearance it is hazy, strong binding, lively, impeccable foaming. Very good, very top!Hail to the King! 🙌🏻 👑
