/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: Que cerveja maravilhosa! A EverBrew NÃO ERRA! Sensacional. No aroma muito lúpulo, tangerina, maracujá, remete a frutas cítricas. No paladar muito lúpulo e malte, misturado com um início amargo gostoso e com um final pouco picante. ❤️‍🔥
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: What a wonderful beer! EverBrew DOESN’T MAKE MISTAKES! Sensational. In the aroma, there is a lot of hops, tangerine, passion fruit, reminiscent of citrus fruits. On the palate a lot of hops and malt, mixed with a tasty bitter start and a slightly spicy finish. ❤️‍🔥

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.comment: velho olha essa cor... amarela como polpa, corpo macio, aromática, ibu alto como eu gosto, aquele amargor marcante dando as caras no retrogosto. Sucão padrão everbrew !
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-ever-kings/280930.translatedComment: old man, look at this color... yellow like pulp, soft body, aromatic, high ibu just like I like, that striking bitterness showing up in the aftertaste. Everbrew standard suction!

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Tomei com meu pai na casa dele. Avelã explodindo.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: I took it with my father at his house. Exploding hazelnut.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Essa breja me lembrou os tempos altos da Salvador da Cookie de chocolate, minha primeira Hankz n tinha sido boa, essa tá uma delícia, moussi de chocolate com avelã... um deleite 🍫
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: This beer reminded me of the high times of Salvador da Cookie de chocolate, my first Hankz hadn't been good, this one is delicious, chocolate moussi with hazelnut... a delight 🍫

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Late - Esqueci de anotar, mas lembro que não estava tão espetacular quanto antes.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Late - I forgot to write it down, but I remember it wasn't as spectacular as before.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Sensação de biscoito de chocolate domina aroma e sabor. O Maple complementa trazendo muito equilíbrio. Tudo no lugar, muito bem feita, delicia.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Chocolate biscuit sensation dominates aroma and flavor. Maple complements it by bringing a lot of balance. Everything in place, very well made, delicious.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Muito boa, uma pena ter ficado ralinha, um pouco mais de corpo e teria ficado perfeita 🍻
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Very good, a shame it was thinner, a little more body and it would have been perfect 🍻

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: isso aqui nao existe. eu tambem nao sei o que dizer. biscoitasso de chocolate c maple filhos, ta loco. isso pq ainda tomei num copo descartavel ta
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: This doesn't exist here. I don't know what to say either. Chocolate and maple cookies, kids, it's crazy. That's because I still drank it in a disposable cup, okay?

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Amargor e dulçor equilibrados, bem cremosa e corpo bem legal. Muito chocolate, café e avelã. Breja bem gostosa, uma delícia a degustação!
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Balanced bitterness and sweetness, very creamy and very nice body. Lots of chocolate, coffee and hazelnuts. Very tasty beer, a delight to taste!

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: 02/10/23. Finalmente bebi essa! Bastante avelã/amendoado no aroma. Chocolate. Maple aparece ao esquentar. No paladar é cremosa, mas não é daquelas pesadonas. Bom equilíbrio, não é enjoativa. Café mais no aftertaste, junto com chocolate amargo. ABV nem vi.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: 02/10/23. I finally drank this! Quite hazelnut/almond aroma. Chocolate. Maple appears when warming up. On the palate it is creamy, but not heavy. Good balance, not cloying. Coffee more in the aftertaste, along with dark chocolate. I didn't even see ABV.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Biscoitão gritando. Maple também muito presente e notas de avelã. Curti muito, pois não traz um dulçor que incomoda.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Biscuit screaming. Maple also very present and notes of hazelnut. I really liked it, as it doesn't have an uncomfortable sweetness.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: avelã e biscoito dominando no aroma, dulçor na medida
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: hazelnut and biscuit dominating the aroma, just the right amount of sweetness

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Simplesmente sensacional, equilíbrio incrível dessa cerveja... Chocolate, maple avelã todos presentes...
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Simply sensational, incredible balance of this beer... Chocolate, maple hazelnut all present...

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Não achei minha avaliação aqui mas foi meu 2o lote que provei dela. Continua muito boa. Avelã dominante, chocolate e maple também aparecem bem. Não senti praticamente nada de café.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: I didn't find my review here but it was my 2nd batch that I tried. Still very good. Dominant hazelnut, chocolate and maple also appear well. I didn't feel practically any coffee at all.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Bela cerveja! Cacau e avelã bem presentes pra formar um brownie liquido.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Beautiful beer! Cocoa and hazelnuts are well present to form a liquid brownie.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Corpo um pouco mais baixo q o último lote, mas aroma e sabor incríveis. Muitooooooo avelã, chocolate, café e maple. Uma festa de sabores em equilíbrio, com dulçor muito bem ajustado, assim como amargor. Uma delícia beber isso sempre.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Body a little lower than the last batch, but incredible aroma and flavor. Sooooo hazelnut, chocolate, coffee and maple. A feast of flavors in balance, with very well adjusted sweetness, as well as bitterness. A delight to drink this every time.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Muito aroma de bolacha e manteiga e um pouco de café. Muito corpo e acidez leve, como deve ser. Sabores de café, amêndoas e o amanteigado do maple. Única pequena falha um ligeiro dulçor acima ao final
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Lots of aroma of biscuits and butter and a little coffee. Lots of body and light acidity, as it should be. Flavors of coffee, almonds and maple buttery. Only small flaw a slight sweetness at the end

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Biscoitão de maple!
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Maple biscuit!

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Aromas de avelã e mapple. Sabores mantém,  remetendo a um biscoito. Saborosa.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Aromas of hazelnut and maple. Flavors maintained, reminiscent of a biscuit. Tasty.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Aroma de avelã predominantemente, após maple, café, tostado e chocolate. Paladar com a avelã e maple com bastante sinergia, chocolate e café trazendo o amargor pra equilibrar e, por fim, aveia e lactose conferindo o corpo cremoso.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Aroma of hazelnut predominantly, after maple, coffee, toast and chocolate. Palate with hazelnut and maple with a lot of synergy, chocolate and coffee bringing the bitterness to balance and, finally, oats and lactose giving the creamy body.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Brasília Beer Geek. Encerrando com essa pastry stout -  Aroma bem diferenciado em relação à RIS- baunilha e paçoca, eu acho, ou talvez biscoito Maria, o aroma permanece. Na boca, baixo amargor, sem dulçor. Excelente!

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Aroma de Avelã e biscoito. No paladar muito chocolate amargor, maple, café, Avelã e biscoito. Dulcor baixo e amargor medio/alto equilibrados em uma base levemente licorosa.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Hazelnut and biscuit aroma. On the palate a lot of bitter chocolate, maple, coffee, hazelnut and biscuit. Low sweetness and medium/high bitterness balanced in a slightly liqueur base.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Beber infinito disso é sempre muito bom
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Drinking infinitely of this is always very good

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Quanto aroma!
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: How much aroma!

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Liquid cookie/wafer. Rich pastry. Loaded adjuncts. Sweet fudge choc, coffee, maple, vanilla, wood, nuts/peanuts/hazelnut. Nutella-like. Sweet (not tiring), syrupy, sticky. Mouthcoating. Rich. Burnt, roasty. Layered. All luscious, impressive. A monster. VG
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Liquid cookie/wafer. Rich pastry. Loaded adjuncts. Sweet fudge choc, coffee, maple, vanilla, wood, nuts/peanuts/hazelnut. Nutella-like. Sweet (not tiring), syrupy, sticky. Mouthcoating. Rich. Burnt, roasty. Layered. All luscious, impressive. A monster. VG

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Irretocável! Todos os adjuntos aparecem com intensidade e equilíbrio, somados a uma base bem explorada. Café, cacau, chocolate, avelã, biscoito, caramelo, maple, baunilha e leve canela. Corpo alto. Amargor moderado, suficiente para o balanço.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Irreproachable! All adjuncts appear with intensity and balance, adding to a well-explored base. Coffee, cocoa, chocolate, hazelnut, biscuit, caramel, maple, vanilla and light cinnamon. Tall body. Moderate bitterness, enough for balance.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Nossa senhora. O que é essa cerveja?! Um biscoitao de chocolate e avelã, maple, café. Deliciosa. Que pena ser a primeira vez, pq gostaria de ter mais.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Our Lady. What is this beer?! A chocolate and hazelnut cookie, maple, coffee. Delicious. It's a shame it's the first time, because I would like to have more.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Os únicos que ainda me fazem querer comprar pastry stout
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: The only ones that still make me want to buy pastry stout

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Ótima
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Excellent

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Harmonizada com Ferrero Roche. Interessante, sensação de comer um waffle tomando um café. A avelã da cerveja se apagou devido ao chocolate, deixando espaço para o chocolate e o café da cervrja. Gostei.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Harmonized with Ferrero Roche. Interesting, the feeling of eating a waffle while drinking coffee. The hazelnut in the beer was extinguished due to the chocolate, leaving room for the chocolate and coffee in the beer. I liked.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Se tivesse 5,25, daria facilmente. Redundância é a palavra em relação ao lote anterior, com menor presença das avelãs e corpo mais baixo, o que aumentou mais a drinkability. LCI 29/06/2022.
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: If I had 5.25, I would easily give it. Redundancy is the word in relation to the previous batch, with less presence of hazelnuts and a lower body, which further increased drinkability. LCI 06/29/2022.

/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.comment: Extremamente complexa, várias camadas de sobremesa, para o meu paladar preferia um pouco mais densa, porém, muito boa!
/b/hankzbier-i-don-t-know-what-to-say-to.translatedComment: Extremely complex, several layers of dessert, for my palate I preferred it a little denser, but very good!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Direto da fábrica, microlote segue icônico e com o mesmo padrão dos lotes anteriores, na minha opinião em termos de constância e considerando toda a obra deve ser facilmente a melhor ris de linha nacional que temos
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Straight from the factory, the micro-batch remains iconic and with the same standard as the previous batches, in my opinion in terms of consistency and considering the entire work, it should easily be the best national line ris we have

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: LCI
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: LCI

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Eu hoje tive um pesadelo e levantei atento, a tempoEu acordei com medo e procurei no escuro alguém com seu carinhoE lembrei de um tempoPorque o passado me traz uma lembrançaDo tempo que eu era criançaE o medo era motivo de choroDesculpa pra um abraço
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Today I had a nightmare and I woke up alert, in time I woke up scared and looked in the dark for someone to care about And I remembered a time Because the past brings me a memory Of the time when I was a child And fear was a reason to cry Excuse me for a hug

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Dispensa comentários

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Maintaining the highest level!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Sempre um deleite essa cerveja…
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: This beer is always a treat…

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Delicious
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Delicious

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Muito foda !!!!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Very cool !!!!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Simplesmente incrível! Um trabalho espetacular e sem a necessidade de usar lactose, mesmo assim uma pastry muito mais encorpada que a maioria do mercado. Para beber(comer?) de colher.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Simply incredible! A spectacular work without the need to use lactose, yet a much fuller-bodied pastry than most on the market. To drink (eat?) with a spoon.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Muito aromática! Corpo alto e bem macio. Amargor médio equilibra o dulçor alto. Caramelo predomina, seguido de avelã, cacau, chocolate e café. Sensação de biscoito/stroopwafel. Leve sugestão de framboesa. Salgado em gosto base e retrogosto.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Very aromatic! High and very soft body. Medium bitterness balances high sweetness. Caramel predominates, followed by hazelnut, cocoa, chocolate and coffee. Biscuit/stroopwafel sensation. Slight hint of raspberry. Salty in base taste and aftertaste.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Beirando a perfeição.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Bordering on perfection.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Ótima, caramelo e avelã brilham em um corpo macio e licoroso, uma delícia.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Excellent, caramel and hazelnut shine in a soft and liqueur body, delicious.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Surpreendente em todos os sentidos possíveis
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Surprising in every way possible

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Super rich and decadent
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Super rich and decadent

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: DMD 2022
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: DMD 2022

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Quando a expectativa surpreende
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: When expectations surprise

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Melhor da noite!!!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Best of the night!!!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Overly sweet and pastry. Black Mauro day.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Overly sweet and pastry. Black Mauro day.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Excelente! Avelã sobressai no aroma. No sabor, a avelã ganha companhia do caramelo, lembra um achocolatado, bolacha doce. Flor de sal faz um ótimo contraponto ao dulçor. Álcool sutil. Corpo denso. Pra ser degustada sem pressa
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Great! Hazelnut stands out in the aroma. In terms of flavor, hazelnut is accompanied by caramel, reminiscent of a chocolate drink, a sweet biscuit. Fleur de sel makes a great counterpoint to the sweetness. Subtle alcohol. Dense body. To be enjoyed without rushing

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Lindíssima cerveja da Tarin! Por incrível que pareça senti aroma de casquinha de sorvete! Sedosa, equilibrada! Um tanto de wafer aqui, castanha ali. Os 9% estão muito bem inseridos.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Beautiful beer from Tarin! As incredible as it may seem, I smelled an ice cream cone! Silky, balanced! A little wafer here, brown there. The 9% are very well included.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Uma das melhores Pastry Stouts nacionais. Cada adjunto tem sua camada de sabor extremamente bem definida, se somando perfeitamente ao conjunto. Tarin sempre fazendo um trabalho impecável.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: One of the best national Pastry Stouts. Each adjunct has its own layer of flavor that is extremely well defined, adding perfectly to the set. Tarin always doing an impeccable job.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Sensacional, sedosa, álcool muito bem inserido, dulçor controlado, caramelo salgado e avelã brilhando
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Sensational, silky, very well inserted alcohol, controlled sweetness, salted caramel and hazelnut shining

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Vencida em 08/21, ainda bem deliciosa e com dulçor ameno mas carbonatou demais, preferi a última versão
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Expired on 08/21, still very delicious and with a mild sweetness but too carbonated, I preferred the last version

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: I don't say this lightly, but this was one of the best pastry stouts I've ever had!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: I don't say this lightly, but this was one of the best pastry stouts I've ever had!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Simplesmente a MELHOR cerveja que já tomei na vida!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Simply the BEST beer I've ever had in my life!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Sempre ouvi falar e tive a oportunidade de experimentar no último fim de semana. Maravilhosa! Eu ainda fico impressionado com cervejas nesse nível de qualidade.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: I've always heard about it and had the opportunity to try it last weekend. Wonderful! I'm still impressed with beers at this level of quality.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Como é que pode uma coisa dessa? 😱
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: How can something like that happen? 😱

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Loaded. Caramel, hazelnut, nurnt, roasty. Savory. Oily,thixk.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Loaded. Caramel, hazelnut, nurnt, roasty. Savory. Oily,thixk.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Delícia! Vamos de festival ISO!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Delight! Let's go to the ISO festival!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Que lote maneiro!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: What a cool batch!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Waffle de chocolate/avelã puro
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Pure chocolate/hazelnut waffle

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Impressionante
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Impressive

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Envasada 03/05, manteve o altíssimo padrão dos lotes anteriores, segue sendo aquela delícia! Aroma chamou muita atenção, tá surreal. Segue em paladar naquele festival de caramelo salgado com avelã, equilibrada, sobremesa líquida bem acertada!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Bottled 03/05, it maintained the very high standard of the previous batches, it continues to be delicious! Aroma caught a lot of attention, it's surreal. Continue on your palate with that festival of salted caramel with hazelnut, balanced, well-balanced liquid dessert!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: A hazelnut explosion. A truly liquid dessert.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: A hazelnut explosion. A truly liquid dessert.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Mantendo o padrão das batches anteriores.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Maintaining the standard of previous batches.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: (LCI) Disparado um dos melhores aromas que já senti numa cerveja. MUITA avelã, flor de sal e caramelo. Impecável! No paladar fui pego de surpresa. O nome me fez imaginar que seria pesadona, mas não! Desce fácil que é uma beleza! Dilícia demais! Absurda!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: (LCI) One of the best aromas I've ever felt in a beer. LOTS of hazelnut, fleur de sel and caramel. Impeccable! On the palate I was taken by surprise. The name made me think it would be heavy, but no! It goes down easily, it's beautiful! Too much trouble! Absurd!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: #superlate
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: #superlate

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Pós 21k de corrida, desceu redondinha. Mas caiu um pouco pro batch anterior.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: After 21k of running, he went downhill. But it dropped a little compared to the previous batch.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Perfeita
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Perfect

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: 2° batch - continua ótima, carbonatacão um pouco acentuada nessa lata, porém nada que atrapalhe a degustação.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: 2nd batch - still great, carbonation a little sharp in this can, but nothing that affects the tasting.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Um creme gianduia com caramelo e um sutil salgado no fim do gole. Que cerveja!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: A gianduja cream with caramel and a subtle saltiness at the end of the sip. What beer!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Proposta executada com perfeição! A avelã sobressai, mas é possível notar o adocicado do caramelo e, ao fim do gole, delicado toque salgado. O corpo está ligeiramente mais suave do que andamos provando.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Proposal executed perfectly! The hazelnut stands out, but it is possible to notice the sweetness of the caramel and, at the end of the sip, a delicate salty touch. The body is slightly softer than we've been experiencing.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Sensacional
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Sensational

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Dei azar, lata do 2o lote armazenada sempre em geladeira, mas que espumou igual coca com mentos quando abri, jogando praticamente todo o conteúdo fora. Nem provei o que sobrou, por ter ficado indignado de ter que limpar o chao, por isso vai sem nota.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: I was unlucky, the 2nd batch can was always stored in the fridge, but it foamed like coke and mentos when I opened it, throwing practically all the contents away. I didn't even taste what was left, because I was indignant at having to clean the floor, so it goes without a rating.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Avelã, caramelo, amendoim, leve salgado, chocolate amargo, pasta de amendoim, dulçor leve. Para beber de colher.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Hazelnut, caramel, peanuts, light salty, dark chocolate, peanut butter, light sweetness. To drink with a spoon.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Terceiro check-in, mantendo o alto nível de antes, com foco destinado ao caramelo salgado e a um impecável trabalho com avelã, que continua sendo um dos melhores já vistos. Senti leve adstringência dessa vez, mas nada a ponto de atrapalhar.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Third check-in, maintaining the high level as before, with a focus on salted caramel and impeccable work with hazelnut, which continues to be one of the best ever seen. I felt a slight astringency this time, but nothing that was disturbing.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Primeiro batch, após guardar por um tempo ganhou um amendoim aqui bem presente. Interessante! 🤙🏽🍻
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: First batch, after keeping it for a while, there was a peanut present here. Interesting! 🤙🏽🍻
1st batch 08/11/20

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: A nova leva nem chega perto da anterior. Uma pena, já que era um espetáculo.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: The new wave doesn't even come close to the previous one. A shame, as it was a spectacle.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Ótima concepção e execução. Falo com mais detalhes no meu Instagram @mateus_vidigal_
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Great conception and execution. I talk in more detail on my Instagram @mateus_vidigal_

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Lariquenta 🤪🤤🤘
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Lariquenta 🤪🤤🤘

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Segundo lote. Ainda continua fantástica. Os três elementos em perfeita harmonia: Salgadinho que domina mas sem exagero, caramelo e avelã em perfeito sincronismo.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Second batch. It's still fantastic. The three elements in perfect harmony: Salty that dominates but without exaggeration, caramel and hazelnut in perfect synchronization.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Quase 6 meses sem álcool. Voltamos!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Almost 6 months without alcohol. We come back!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Batch 2. Batch 1 muito melhor
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Batch 2. Batch 1 much better

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Adjuntos bem inseridos mas não curto sensação de frisância na boca numa pastry stout....
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Adjuncts well inserted but I don't like the sensation of frizz in the mouth in a pastry stout....

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Espetacular
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Amazing

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Under the Bridge. Blood Sugar Sex Magik, Red Hot Chili Peppers.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Under the Bridge. Blood Sugar Sex Magik, Red Hot Chili Peppers.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Aroma de sonho de valsa. Breja Maravilhosa!!!!!!!
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Waltz dream scent. Wonderful Breja!!!!!!!

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Dessa vez achei enjoativa
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: This time I found it boring

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Algo deu errado aqui, bem abaixo do primeiro lote. Carbonatação muito alta, oxidação e metálico. Acidez no final, os adjuntos desaparecem na boca. Não deu pra tomar, foi pro ralo.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Something went wrong here, way below the first batch. Very high carbonation, oxidation and metallic. Acidity at the end, the adjuncts disappear in the mouth. I couldn't drink it, it went down the drain.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: Aroma e sabor de pastry exaltados. Adjuntos estão todos presentes, até mesmo o toque salgado. Conjunto bacana e sem exageros.
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: Exalted pastry aroma and flavor. Adjuncts are all present, even the salty touch. Nice and not exaggerated set.

/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.comment: MDS! Q cervejaa! Avelã e caramelo explodindo, com biscoito e 🍫 mt presente tbm. Paladar elegante, dulçor em perfeito equilíbrio com a flor de sal q aparece ao fim do gole. Aveludada, com ótima drikability. Excepcional o trabalho da Tarin nessa obra!😍
/b/tarin-cervejaria-de-colher-avela-flor.translatedComment: OMG! What beer! Hazelnut and caramel exploding, with biscuits and 🍫 lots of gifts too. Elegant palate, sweetness in perfect balance with the fleur de sel that appears at the end of the sip. Velvety, with excellent drikability. Tarin’s work on this project is exceptional!😍

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Sempre entregando muito. Ultima que tomei foi há 1 ano e meio atrás e continua no padrão .Drinkability excelente para uma double neipa. Turbidez padrão.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Always delivering a lot. The last one I took was 1 year and a half ago and it's still at the standard. Excellent drinkability for a double neipa. Standard turbidity.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Late. Explosão de abacaxi e pêssego.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: I had it on draft, it was excellent!!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Everbrew prometendo muito e entregando sempre mais 🤌🏻
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Everbrew promising a lot and always delivering more 🤌🏻

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Cerveja foda, NE IPA do jeito que eu gosto
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Cool beer, NE IPA just the way I like it

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: 香气中等，香甜清新易饮，甜感略多了点，酒精感能感受到一点，整体还不错。
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: The aroma is medium, sweet, fresh and easy to drink, with a little too much sweetness and a little bit of alcohol. Overall it's not bad.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: 上生啤喷了我一身我丢
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Serve draft beer and spray me all over, I throw it away

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Achei ela mais lupulada que a anterior 👏🏻👏🏻
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: I thought it was hoppier than the previous one 👏🏻👏🏻

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: So juicy! Fantastic, fulsome body. Sumptuous mouthfeel.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: So juicy! Fantastic, fulsome body. Sumptuous mouthfeel.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Breja com muitas frutas amarelas, bom drinkabililty, amargor passou do ponto pra mim.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Breja with lots of yellow fruits, good drinkability, bitterness was over the top for me.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: En el Bar EAP São Paulo - Septiembre 2022
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: At the EAP Bar São Paulo - September

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Sabor que acompanha, bem encorpado, apresentando também notas de malte, trigo e aveia; amargor bem colocado e álcool bem equilibrado também.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Flavor that accompanies, very full-bodied, also presenting notes of malt, wheat and oats; well-placed bitterness and well-balanced alcohol as well.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Longe da Double Maine em latas, corpo baixo, sem a explosão do citra!
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Far from Double Maine in cans, low body, without the burst of citra!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Bom corpo, sabor marcantede notas frutadas, lupulada e cadbonatada a medida certo, mas adstringencia alcoolica muito pronunciada o qie leva de um 4 pra um 3.5. No Barcearia sempre divertido,  bom servico, no frills.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Good body, striking flavor of fruity notes, hoppy and just right, but very pronounced alcoholic astringency which takes it from a 4 to a 3.5. At Barcearia it's always fun, good service, no frills.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Cherim bom... amargor raiz... bom demais!!
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Good cherim... root bitterness... too good!!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.comment: Comprado Farinha e Água , Pedra Azul - ES
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-maine/3124.translatedComment: Purchased Flour and Water, Pedra Azul - ES

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Tasted on 11/17/2023

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Melhor single Citra do BR.O cítrico e tropical dessa ceva ta um esculacho.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Best single Citra from BR. The citrus and tropical of this barley is a blast.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: S tier
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: S tier

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Tomada em 05/2017. Na época foi a melhor cerveja que já tinha tomado. Tem tudo que pede uma american IPA, amargor forte, na medida, leve harsh, cítrico como lima, capim limão, esplêndida e ainda a base de malte balanceia tudo com maestria. Perfeita!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Taken on 05/2017. At the time it was the best beer I had ever had. It has everything an American IPA requires, strong bitterness, just right, light harsh, citrus like lime, lemongrass, splendid and the malt base balances everything masterfully. Perfect!

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Quando é bom, num tem mió.Melhor Single Citra do Brasil.Base sedosa, cítrico explode, frutas tropicais. Isso é bom dms
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: When it's good, there's nothing wrong with it.Best Single Citra in Brazil.Silky base, exploding citrus, tropical fruits. This is good dms

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Aroma de maracujá, abacaxi, capim limão e toranja. Muito sabor de laranja, maracujá, pêssego, pinho e herbal. Um amargor absurdo mas muito bem equilibrado com o corpo e residual doce do corpo da breja.  Our concour!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Aroma of passion fruit, pineapple, lemongrass and grapefruit. Lots of orange, passion fruit, peach, pine and herbal flavor. An absurd bitterness but very well balanced with the body and sweet residual of the breja body. Our competition!

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Macia, aromática, gostosa
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Soft, aromatic, delicious

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Ótima cerveja, saúde!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Great beer, cheers!

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Light and sweet, heather honey, lemon curd, lacking much in the way of bitterness or aroma
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Light and sweet, heather honey, lemon curd, lacking much in the way of bitterness or aroma

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: A porrada continua….

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: SUPER light for a double.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Muito boa. Encorpada, forte no sabor. Repito com ctzDiferença pra lover licious (2 melhores), eh que eh possível qse que identificar sabores de casca nessa
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Very good. Full-bodied, strong in flavor. I repeat with ctzDifference for lover licious (2 best), it is possible to identify peel flavors in this

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Sweet, mildly bitter aftertaste. Very chalky.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Sweet, mildly bitter aftertaste. Very chalky.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: 28/04/2018Minha primeira Dogma.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: 04/28/2018My first Dogma.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Lote novo !!! Sensacional !
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: New batch!!! Sensational !

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Frutada e cremosa (gostinho de manga ao fundo).
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Fruity and creamy (taste of mango in the background).

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: (LCI)
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: (LCI)

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Aroma herbal intenso com cítrico presente. Paladar repete e traz também frutas amarelas e um amargor aveludado. Boa formação e retenção de espuma.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Intense herbal aroma with citrus present. The palate repeats and also brings yellow fruits and a velvety bitterness. Good foam formation and retention.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Lote anterior melhor! Mas não deixa de ser boa
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Previous batch better! But it's still good

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Muito boa, senti laranja e abacaxi. Aroma forte de maracujá e frutas tropicais, cítrico da citra encaixa bem.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Very good, I felt orange and pineapple. Strong aroma of passion fruit and tropical fruits, citrus from citra fits well.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.comment: Bem Hazy, cerveja boa, mas confesso que estava esperando mais
/b/cervejaria-dogma-citra-lover/1641577.translatedComment: Very Hazy, good beer, but I confess I was expecting more

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Reminiscent of when I third wheeled on Alex M. honeymoon in Des Moines
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Reminiscent of when I third wheeled on Alex M. honeymoon in Des Moines

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Uau. Que Juicy IPA. Bem turva, espuma branca e densa. Uma puxada para o pinos. Amargor na medida. Bem equilibrada. Sensacional.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Wow. What a Juicy IPA. Very cloudy, white and dense foam. A pull for the pins. Bitterness to measure. Well-balanced. Sensational.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Bastante cítrica e com corpo sedoso. Alta drinkability para o estilo. Único ponto que me incomodou um pouquinho foi o amargor que me pareceu um pouco artificial proveniente do terpeno.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Very citrusy and with a silky body. High drinkability for style. The only point that bothered me a little was the bitterness that seemed a little artificial to me from the terpene.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Essa é nota máxima. Extremamente cítrica, sinto maracujá, manda, melão, melancia. Aroma sensacional. Paladar de lúpulo BOMBÁSTICO! Amargor não atrapalha em nada. Nota 10! Acho que foi uma das melhores que já tomei da EverBrew.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: This is maximum grade. Extremely citrusy, I feel passion fruit, mango, melon, watermelon. Sensational aroma. BOMBASTIC hop flavor! Bitterness doesn't hurt anything. Grade 10! I think it was one of the best I've ever had from EverBrew.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Muito boa, mas pelo hype achei que seria melhor.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Very good, but based on the hype I thought it would be better.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Terreno deu um plus nos aromas.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Terrain gave a plus to the aromas.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Stupidly juicy and really solid consistency. Love it
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Stupidly juicy and really solid consistency. Love it

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Boa....gostinho de erva e amargaaaaa hahahahaha
Hazy, juicy, creamy, and piney.  Excellent.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Hazy, juicy, creamy, and piney.  Excellent.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: 浅橙色酒体，闻香淡淡的青草 甜橘子，入口酒体不厚，顺滑度一般，柑橘甜 树脂，随之一些药草 草本苦 ，苦度适中 不延续，苦有点沉，口粮的水平
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Light orange body, with a faint aroma of grass and sweet orange. The wine body is not thick in the mouth, smoothness is average, citrus is sweet and resinous, followed by some herbs and herbs, the bitterness is moderate and does not last, the bitterness is a bit heavy, and the level of rations

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Tomei com o Gui e meu pai na fonte.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: I drank it with Gui and my father at the fountain.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Bela juicy, aroma muito singular. Amargor potente, sabor de berries, dank brilhando. Aroma explode muito elegante, aquecimento trouxe caráter canábico.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Beautiful juicy, very unique aroma. Powerful bitterness, berry flavor, dank shining. Aroma explodes very elegant, warming brought cannabis character.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Cerveja que beira a perfeição no estilo! Impressionante essa pegada! Show!
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Beer that borders on perfection in style! This footprint is impressive! Show!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Cerveja Turva, opaca, espuma bonita. Bem suculenta!Ótimos aromas, cítricos, bastante Dank.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Cloudy, opaque beer, beautiful foam. Very juicy! Great aromas, citrus, very Dank.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: N: Simcoe and Citra? Blueberry, medium ripe pineapple, grapefruit pith and peel, grassy, fragrant. M: smooth, creamy juice, very good delicate bitterness. Dank and excellent!
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: N: Simcoe and Citra? Blueberry, medium ripe pineapple, grapefruit pith and peel, grassy, fragrant. M: smooth, creamy juice, very good delicate bitterness. Dank and excellent!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: sucão, cítrico, leve berries no aroma, maracujá, resinosa, dankizinho honesto, e amargor na medida
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: suction, citrus, light berries in the aroma, passion fruit, resinous, honest dankizinho, and just the right amount of bitterness

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.comment: Limão, laranja, maracujá, bem cítrica e limpa.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-maine-berry-gelat.translatedComment: Lemon, orange, passion fruit, very citrusy and clean.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Revisitando, perfil de capuccino dividindo o protagonismo com a baunilha, amêndoas e chocolate, café mais apagado do que a safra 2017, corpo segue alto e abv invisível, saudades da velha 5 elementos.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Revisiting, cappuccino profile sharing the spotlight with vanilla, almonds and chocolate, coffee duller than the 2017 vintage, body remains high and abv invisible, I miss the old 5 elements.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Tá animal, achocolatado pesado. Valeu Igor L.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: It's animal, heavy chocolate. Thanks Igor L.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Man het Spaans niet goed vertalen, weet wel dat dit een hele goede roasty koffiebom is.. 👌🤘💪
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Man doesn't translate Spanish well, but I know this is a very good roasty coffee bomb.. 👌🤘💪

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Dikke prima heur. Licht roasty, beetje bittere choco. Mooi vol.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Very good sir. Slightly roasty, slightly bitter chocolate. Nicely full.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Mais uma que evoluiu bem com o tempo. Café sumiu, canela apareceu ainda mais. Assim como as outras, também tivemos um pouco de Porto aqui. Contudo, agora mais sutil. Corpo mais leve em razão da oxidação da proteína do malte.  Fresca era mais intensa.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Another one that evolved well over time. Coffee disappeared, cinnamon appeared even more. Like the others, we also had a bit of Porto here. However, now more subtle. Lighter body due to the oxidation of malt protein. Fresca was more intense.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Excepcional equilíbrio na complexidade. Aroma de bourbon, madeira, chocolate, café, melaço, leite. Sabor doce, remetendo ao café, achocolatado, média acidez da lactose. Corpo alto, licorosa, com alto aquecimento. Cerveja forte, pungente, enebriante.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Exceptional balance in complexity. Aroma of bourbon, wood, chocolate, coffee, molasses, milk. Sweet flavor, reminiscent of coffee, chocolatey, medium acidity from lactose. High body, liqueur, with high warming. Strong, pungent, intoxicating beer.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Isso ainda tá lindo, adjuntos no lugar! Exatos dois anos de guarda!
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: This is still beautiful, adjuncts in place! Exactly two years of guard!

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Confraria virtual GDB.Garrafa n. 281, exatos 2 anos de guarda, perdeu um pouco de potência e corpo, más ganhou complexidade, canela mt bem inserida, açúcar queimado,banana passa e ameixa, choc,massa de bolo,café,cinzas, lembro pé de moleque e Capuccino.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: GDB.Garrafa virtual brotherhood n. 281, aged for exactly 2 years, lost a little power and body, but gained complexity, very well inserted cinnamon, burnt sugar, banana raisins and plums, choc, cake dough, coffee, ash, I remember pé de moleque and Capuccino.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Garraf 422/1000. Cerveja ainda está excelente. Aroma canela, banana passa, café, Chocolate ao leite, torra, cinza, capuccino. Segue no sabor com um acréscimo de açúcar queimado no retrô. Corpo médio ato. MF bem macia. Cerveja complexa, equilibrada. Linda.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Bottle 422/1000. Beer is still excellent. Aroma of cinnamon, banana raisin, coffee, milk chocolate, roast, ash, cappuccino. It continues in flavor with an addition of burnt sugar in the retro. Medium body act. Very soft MF. Complex, balanced beer. Beautiful.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Adocicou bastante... a anterior estava melhor, mas essa está boa ainda.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: It sweetened a lot... the previous one was better, but this one is still good.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Quem disse que envelhecer na garrafa não dá notas mais intensas? Um brinde a saúde e que essa pandemia passe rápido.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Who said that aging in the bottle doesn't give more intense notes? Here's to good health and may this pandemic pass quickly.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Régua Reserve 2017, 2018 e 2019, da esquerda pra direita.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Reserve Ruler 2017, 2018 and 2019, from left to right.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: A Cerveja não ganhou com o tempo de guarda. Porém, eu sempre ganho com o trabalho perfeito da 5E.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Beer did not benefit from storage time. However, I always win with 5E's perfect work.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Melhor do que eu me lembrava.

Outstanding aroma. True coffee, cinnamon, spices, licorice. Heavy choc, vanilla, dark fruits. Powerful. Mexican grip. Oily, syrupy, bodied. Could be thicker. Astringent edge. Woody, nutty. Peppery end. Deep. Monster set.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Outstanding aroma. True coffee, cinnamon, spices, licorice. Heavy choc, vanilla, dark fruits. Powerful. Mexican grip. Oily, syrupy, bodied. Could be thicker. Astringent edge. Woody, nutty. Peppery end. Deep. Monster set.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: canela foi a atriz principal, cafe perdeu força.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Canela was the main actress, Cafe lost strength.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: + Impressionante o tanto que a canela apareceu cm o tempo. O cafe ta com um perfil mais frutado a torra diminuiu. gostaria dela cm pimenta.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: + It's impressive how much cinnamon has appeared over time. The coffee has a more fruity profile and the roasting has decreased. I would like her in pepper.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Baunilha e chocolate amargo muito presentes. Gostosa, porém tbm senti bastante o álcool, o que deixou o drinkability baixo pra mim.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Vanilla and dark chocolate very present. Delicious, but I also felt a lot of alcohol, which left the drinkability low for me.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Breja foda, corpo alto, dulçor  de baunilha e cacau, o café  fica em segundo plano.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Cool beer, high body, vanilla and cocoa sweetness, coffee takes a backseat.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Que cerveja! Condimento, canela, equilibrada, com notas de baunilha, chocolate... Deliciosa!
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: What beer! Spice, cinnamon, balanced, with notes of vanilla, chocolate... Delicious!

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Café bem presente, madeira discreta, destilado de fundo no aroma, amargor bem destacado
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Coffee very present, discreet wood, distillate in the background aroma, bitterness well highlighted

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Brazilian beer. Cinnamon, chocolate, creamy, bourbon, chocolate mousse, coffee.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Brazilian beer. Cinnamon, chocolate, creamy, bourbon, chocolate mousse, coffee.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Everything I love in an Impy with the addition of cinnamon which doesn’t come through until the finish. A swap for chilli would have been 5!
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Everything I love in an Impy with the addition of cinnamon which doesn’t come through until the finish. A swap for chilli would have been 5!

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: #latecheckin, #slowbrewbrasil2018. Para mim, a melhor cerveja do evento.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: #latecheckin, #slowbrewbrasil2018. For me, the best beer of the event.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Starts quite complex and loaded. Coffee, roast, cinnamon, vanilla, dark choc. Cake, nuts, wood. Sweet sip, sticky, thick, oily. Spicy, anise, condiments. Amazing set. Heavy one.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Starts quite complex and loaded. Coffee, roast, cinnamon, vanilla, dark choc. Cake, nuts, wood. Sweet sip, sticky, thick, oily. Spicy, anise, condiments. Amazing set. Heavy one.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.comment: Densa, encorpada, decadente! Que cerveja foda. Marcando 1000 check Ins com uma das melhores cervejas que já provei.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-rese.translatedComment: Dense, full-bodied, decadent! What a badass beer. Marking 1000 check ins with one of the best beers I've ever tasted.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: Na torneira tava melhor, com mais corpo e mais amarga, excelente
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: It was better on tap, with more body and more bitter, excellent

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: O man. Wat lekker.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: Oh man. How nice.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: Rótulo que dispensa comentários.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: Label that requires no comments.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: Coloração turva, e com bastante lactose que esconde um pouco a acidez. Bastante frutada, mas baixo amargor para o estilo
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: Cloudy color, and with a lot of lactose that hides the acidity a little. Quite fruity, but low bitterness for the style

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: Fueda! Everbrew manda bem demais nesse estilo!
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: Fueda! Everbrew does this style really well!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: Niks meer onder de radar. Bliksembezoek aan Brugge maar daar vindt je dit werk niet. Fantastisch.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: Nothing under the radar anymore. Lightning visit to Bruges, but you won't find this work there. Fantastic.

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: Deliciosa!! equilibrada no amargor, macia, um creme aveludado de frutas amarelas e tropicais, maracujá, abacaxi, pêssego marcam presença no aroma e sabor, para beber e repetir sempre que puder…
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: Delicious!! balanced in bitterness, soft, a velvety cream of yellow and tropical fruits, passion fruit, pineapple, peach are present in the aroma and flavor, to drink and repeat whenever you can...

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: Cor amarelo palha e turva. Aroma e sabor proeminentes de lúpulo, remetendo a frutas tropicais (maracujá, limão, manga verde), com amargor médio e redondo. Malte apenas de apoio (massa de pão). Notei um ligeiro aquecimento alcoólico. Boa double hazy ipa!
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: Straw yellow and cloudy color. Prominent hop aroma and flavor, reminiscent of tropical fruits (passion fruit, lemon, green mango), with medium and round bitterness. Just supporting malt (bread dough). I noticed a slight alcoholic warming. Good double hazy ipa!

/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.comment: Das frutas cítricas, basta enumerar: tem quase todas aqui, ainda com um belo toque de maracujá. Malte quase não aparece. Tem amargor médio, textura aveludada, nada enjoativa, dulçor frutado médio baixo. Muito sabor de lúpulo no final de boca.
/b/cervejaria-everbrew-double-mont/33557.translatedComment: Of the citrus fruits, just list them: there are almost all of them here, with a nice touch of passion fruit. Malt barely appears. It has medium bitterness, velvety texture, not cloying, medium low fruity sweetness. Lots of hop flavor in the aftertaste.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-dogm.comment: Após 5 anos de adega, arrisco dizer que evoluiu. Negra, viscosa, quase sem espuma. Corpo alto com mouthfeel aveludado. Aroma solto, coco, chocolate ao leite, cacau, caramelo e biscoito, que aparecem todos no paladar. Retrogosto longo de cacau e biscoito.
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-dogm.translatedComment: After 5 years in the cellar, I dare say it has evolved. Black, viscous, almost no foam. Tall body with velvety mouthfeel. Loose aroma, coconut, milk chocolate, cocoa, caramel and biscuit, which all appear on the palate. Long aftertaste of cocoa and biscuit.

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-dogm.comment: Não envelheceu bem
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-dogm.translatedComment: Didn't age well

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-dogm.comment: Pouco mais de 3 anos do envase e se manteve muito boa, apenas uma discreta oxidação e ligeira queda no corpo que se mantém alto e muito macio. Continua com muito côco e chocolate com o café em segundo plano e além de um background torrado, nota mantida!
/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-dogm.translatedComment: Just over 3 years since packaging and it has remained very good, with just a slight oxidation and a slight drop in the body, which remains tall and very soft. It continues with lots of coconut and chocolate with coffee in the background and in addition to a roasted background, note maintained!

/b/5-elementos-cervejaria-artesanal-dogm.translatedComment: It's still her best batch. It evolved very well. Chocolate appears a lot, coconut is in the background. All of this ended up being complemented by plenty of Port wine, which appeared wonderfully in the set. Lighter body, as expected. Fuck!

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Isso aqui está perfeito!! Puta que pariu!!!

Lote vencido em 02/2021. Aroma intenso de chocolate + baunilha e um sutil torrado e café ao fundo. Discreto bretta apareceu, mas sem comprometer nada. Corpo médio-alto, dulçor moderado, o tempo deu uma boa domada no ABV, final levemente torrado. Justa!
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Lot expired on 02/2021. Intense aroma of chocolate + vanilla and a subtle roast and coffee in the background. Bretta appeared discreetly, but without compromising anything. Medium-high body, moderate sweetness, time tamed the ABV well, slightly toasted finish. Fair!

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Weer ff snoepen. Cacao, zoet, vol
Chocolade, niet te bitter. Met duidelijk vanille in de nasmaak. Maar  vooral chocolade.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Chocolate, not too bitter. With clear vanilla in the aftertaste. But especially chocolate.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Cacau, torrado, baunilha, um pouco de nozes ao fundo. Licorosa. Doce. Álcool presente. Corpo alto, carbonatação alta e de boa persistência. Muito boa!
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Cocoa, roasted, vanilla, a little nuts in the background. Liqueur. Sweet. Alcohol present. Full body, high carbonation and good persistence. Very good!

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Heavy, thick and syrupy cocoa/chocolate and vanilla strong and alcoholic roasty and dry smooth mouthfeel stout.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Heavy, thick and syrupy cocoa/chocolate and vanilla strong and alcoholic roasty and dry smooth mouthfeel stout.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Aparência preta e viscosa. Aroma de baunilha bem evidente. Na boca corpo alto, cacau, queimado, baunilha, álcool ao fundo. Muito boa.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Black and slimy appearance. Very evident vanilla aroma. In the mouth, high body, cocoa, burnt, vanilla, alcohol in the background. Very good.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Muito chocolate, baunilha e um pouco de coco no aroma! No sabor traz um chocolate ao leite, morangos. Álcool presente mas sem incomodar. Fantástica!
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Lots of chocolate, vanilla and a little coconut in the aroma! The flavor features milk chocolate and strawberries. Alcohol present but not disturbing. Fantastic!

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Lot of sweetness, cocoa, vanilla, some coffee and roasted malts.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Lot of sweetness, cocoa, vanilla, some coffee and roasted malts.
Creamy...reminds me of Neapolitan ice cream.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: É cerveja misturada, mas com outros ingredientes mais nobres e com sabor do que arroz e milho, rs. Tem aveia, cacau e baunilha. Quebra as lei de pureza, mesmo as mais flexíveis, rsrs. Mas ficou bom.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: It's mixed beer, but with other ingredients that are more noble and flavorful than rice and corn, lol. It has oats, cocoa and vanilla. It breaks purity laws, even the most flexible ones, lol. But it was good.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Corpo aveludaso e licoroso. Aroma e sabor de chocolate amargo e baunilha.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Velvety and liqueur body. Aroma and flavor of dark chocolate and vanilla.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Presente do Emilio S. !!! Isto que é presente.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Gift from Emilio S.!!! This is what is present.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Evoluiu melhor na lata. Arredondou um pouco. Mas o álcool ainda belisca na boca e aparece no aroma. Sensação de corpo não iguala o chope. Baunilha bem presente, chocolate meio amargo.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: It evolved better in the can. Rounded off a little. But the alcohol still pinches in the mouth and appears in the aroma. Body sensation does not match draft beer. Vanilla very present, semi-sweet chocolate.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Dessert... ticking with you boys... thx Willa F. ... super thick SA Imp stout
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Dessert... ticking with you boys... thx Willa F. ... super thick SA Imp stout

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Slightly sweet clean Russian stout. Fairly plain a little roasty.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Slightly sweet clean Russian stout. Fairly plain a little roasty.

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Chocolate, café forte e baunilha fantástica
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Chocolate, strong coffee and fantastic vanilla

/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.comment: Pegada muito artificial, aroma enjoativo, excesso de baunilha com final de chocolate amargo e torrado/queimado. Corpo sedoso.
/b/haunted-brewing-ka-kau-b1/3071566.translatedComment: Very artificial flavor, cloying aroma, excess vanilla with a dark chocolate and toasted/burnt finish. Silky body.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Quase 10 anos de guarda revelaram um equilíbrio absurdo de dulçor, álcool e madeira. Um espetáculo de cerveja que valeu a espera.
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Almost 10 years of aging revealed an absurd balance of sweetness, alcohol and wood. A beer show that was worth the wait.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Oxidação atrapalhou a degustação. Passou do tempo.
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Oxidation hindered the tasting. Time passed.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Foda!
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Powder!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Aroma de melaço e toque vínico. Dulçor elevado, final seco e quente.
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Aroma of molasses and winey touch. High sweetness, dry and warm finish.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: 8 anos depois, continua deliciosa!
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: 8 years later, it’s still delicious!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Depois de praticamente 8 anos guardada, ficou ainda melhor!
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: After practically 8 years of storage, it got even better!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: muito bem! entregaram tudo! no comeco, o aroma e boca puxam p rapadura. depois de uma aquecida, ja mudou p pe de moleque. gostei das nuances.
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: very good! they delivered everything! At first, the aroma and mouth are reminiscent of brown sugar. After warming it up, it has already changed to a kid's appearance. I liked the nuances.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Após 7 anos, está uma lindeza.
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: After 7 years, it is beautiful.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Aged pretty well, caramelly, wood, cachaça, thinned a bit, but that's ok.
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Aged pretty well, caramelly, wood, cachaça, thinned a bit, but that's ok.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: 7 aninhos
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: 7 years old

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Envelheceu perfeitamente ....
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: It aged perfectly....

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Nao envelheceu bem. Que pena.
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: It hasn't aged well. What a shame.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Garrafa  2064. Dulçor forte, toffee, caramelo. Boa persistência, amadeirada. Cor marrom clara. Maravilhosa. Dá pra notar as características da Wee Heavy com a cachaça Weber Haus
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Bottle 2064. Strong sweetness, toffee, caramel. Good persistence, woody. Light brown color. Wonderful. You can notice the characteristics of Wee Heavy with the Weber Haus cachaça

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Envelheceu bem. Amburana no talo mas de uma boa forma. Muita canela, ainda um melado, frutas cristalizadas e tâmaras. Quando vai voltar a fazer cerveja nesse nível Bode?
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: It has aged well. Amburana on the stem but in a good way. Lots of cinnamon, molasses, candied fruits and dates. When will you start making beer at this Bode level again?

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Ruim!!! Só sobrou amburana e cachaça!!!
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Bad!!! All that was left was amburana and cachaça!!!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: From yesterday, Happy B-day to my wife! Bottle #1924
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: From yesterday, Happy B-day to my wife! Bottle #1924

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Evoluiu muitooo bem com o tempo !! Deliciosa !!!
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: It evolved very well over time!! Delicious!!!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Boa harmonização. Madeira mais evidente, álcool esquentando, licorosa

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Amburana, madeira, caramelo, melaço, malte com tosta média, toffee, cachaça sutil, coco, banana passa, alguma baunilha e dulçor moderado
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Amburana, wood, caramel, molasses, medium toasted malt, toffee, subtle cachaça, coconut, banana raisin, some vanilla and moderate sweetness

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Seis anos de guarda.  Ótima cerveja.  Mas não me surpreendeu como eu esperava.
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Six years of guard. Great beer. But it didn't surprise me as I expected.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: backlog
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: backlog

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: muita complexa, melaço e frutas cristalizadas marcante, barril presente, equilibrando o dulçor n fim.  alcool nem aparece. um espetaculo!
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: very complex, molasses and striking candied fruits, barrel present, balancing the sweetness at the end. alcohol doesn't even appear. a show!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Comemorando 5 anos de casamento!
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Celebrating 5 years of marriage!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Garrafa 1288
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Bottle 1288

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Melhor de todas... como o tempo ajuda.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: 5 anos depois...
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: 5 years later...

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Só melhorou com o tempo. Excelente. Punch incrível do malte e da madeira.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Bottle 1939

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Ela ficou ainda melhor!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Maltadão, Graz também uma noz, castanha, chocolate e a umburana coroando a porra toda. Breja incrível. E equilibradamente alcoólica

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Drink after 3 years of aging. Presence of brown sugar, molasses and candied fruits.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Talvez a melhor BA Brasil q ja tomei. Muito coco melaco e cana. Facil de beber alcool n aparece. Obrigado Rodrigo C.

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: fantástica cerveja, quando minhas esperanças de beber ela estavam acabando, mestre Jander C. fez essa bruxaria...
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: fantastic beer, when my hopes of drinking it were fading, master Jander C. did this witchcraft...

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Muita madeira e cachaça no aroma. Melaço, frutas secas e álcool domado no paladar. Viscosa e aquecedora. Delícia!

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Acompanhando a cachaça...
/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.translatedComment: Accompanying the cachaça...

/b/bodebrown-wee-heavy-amburana-wood-age.comment: Wee da Bode muito bem executada, caramelo assertivo e pipocando na boca mas sem incomodar. Creio que ja estava no ápice do que podia oferece

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-3/485948.comment: Barril presente, com amadeirado elegante e bourbon. Baunilha em camadas: fava, pasta e extrato. Todos de ótima qualidade. Soma-se tudo isso a chocolate ao leite, picancia e potência, num corpo alto. Um espetáculo beber com calma e fora de BS.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-3/485948.translatedComment: Present barrel, with elegant woody and bourbon. Layered vanilla: bean, paste and extract. All of great quality. Added to all this is milk chocolate, spice and power, in a high body. A spectacle to drink calmly and without BS.

/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.comment: "Octopus Garden" da Octopus: 8% ABV, uma NE DIPA envolvente. Notas de capim-limão se entrelaçam com maracujá, equilibrando dulçor e amargor persistente. A secura convida a cada gole. O belo lúpulo prolonga a experiência.
/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.translatedComment: "Octopus Garden" by Octopus: 8% ABV, an engaging NE DIPA. Notes of lemongrass intertwine with passion fruit, balancing sweetness and persistent bitterness. Dryness invites every sip. The beautiful hops prolong the experience.

/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.comment: Um verdadeiro suco de frutas! Muito aroma de laranja, maracujá, pera e frutas cítricas. Na boca muito sabor de maracujá, melão e pinho. Boa pedida!
/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.translatedComment: A real fruit juice! Lots of aromas of orange, passion fruit, pear and citrus fruits. In the mouth, a lot of passion fruit, melon and pine flavor. Good call!

/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.comment: Sensacional NE double IPA. Alta carbonatação, espuma branca e densa. Aromática, notas de cereja, maracujá, bem equilibrada.
/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.translatedComment: Sensational NE double IPA. High carbonation, white and dense foam. Aromatic, notes of cherry, passion fruit, well balanced.

/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.comment: o esperado frutado amarelo, mais pra abacaxi, com amargor dos 8 abv sendo o protagonista. entrega bem a proposta
/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.translatedComment: the expected yellow fruity, more like pineapple, with bitterness of 8 abv being the protagonist. delivers the proposal well

/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.comment: Que cerveja! Aroma super tropical, frutas de caroço. Sabor frutado com amargor bem equilibrado, o que dá um drinkability absurdo. Ótimo exemplar do estilo.
/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.translatedComment: What beer! Super tropical aroma, stone fruits. Fruity flavor with well-balanced bitterness, which gives an absurd drinkability. Great example of the style.

/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.comment: Que Breja Absurda!! Lichia gritando no talo!! Octopus, vc é Ridícula!!(Entendedores, entenderam, né Everaldo Marques)...rs, extremamente aveludada e altíssima drikability!!
/b/cervejaria-octopus-octopus-garden/219.translatedComment: What an Absurd Breja!! Lychee screaming on the stalk!! Octopus, you are Ridiculous!! (Experts, you understand, right Everaldo Marques)... lol, extremely velvety and extremely high drikability!!
