/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Refrescante, hazy, aromátixa.  Pouco harsh mas nadq que prejudique.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Refreshing, hazy, aromatic. A little harsh but nothing harmful.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: 4.4. Extremamente frutada, com cítrico remetendo à laranja. Além disso, frutas de caroço em potência: pêssego, ameixa e nectarina. Amargor médio mais equilibra muito bem. Final seco. Excelente!
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: 4.4. Extremely fruity, with citrus reminiscent of orange. Also, stone fruits in power: peach, plum and nectarine. Medium bitterness but balances very well. Dry finish. Great!

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: The Toxic Waltz. Fabulous Disaster, Exodus.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: The Toxic Waltz. Fabulous Disaster, Exodus.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Excelente breja da koala, mesmo com lúpulos australianos que eu não sou fã.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Excellent breja da koala, even with Australian hops that I'm not a fan of.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Amargor persistente..cor bem bonita...aroma maracujá e floral.. corpo médio e sem harsh
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Persistent bitterness..very beautiful color...passion fruit and floral aroma..medium body and no harsh

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Belo de um sucao cítrico e lupulado com final seco.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Nice citrus juice and hoppy with a dry finish.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Infelizmente tem mais droga na cervejaria que boas cervejas! Lavar o banheiro e o minimo!
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Unfortunately there are more drugs in the brewery than good beers! Cleaning the bathroom is the minimum!

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Powerful juice. Lovely dank hops. Orange, grapefruit, mango, melon, papaya, yellow fruits. Fruit peel, slightly bitter. Yeasty. Sweet peachy base. Smooth, creamy, medium bodied, almost chewy. Beautiful texture. This is a complete experience. Outstanding.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Powerful juice. Lovely dank hops. Orange, grapefruit, mango, melon, papaya, yellow fruits. Fruit peel, slightly bitter. Yeasty. Sweet peachy base. Smooth, creamy, medium bodied, almost chewy. Beautiful texture. This is a complete experience. Outstanding.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Env. 20/05, Super laranja presente, very citrus
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Env. 20/05, Super orange present, very citrus

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Uma New England bem feita, cheirosa, gosto bem agradável
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: A well-made New England, fragrant, very pleasant taste

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Aroma de pêssego e manga. Amargor e dulçor na medida certa. Sabor de frutas tropicais maduras. Sem dúvidas um exemplo a ser seguido!
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Aroma of peach and mango. Bitterness and sweetness in the right amount. Flavor of ripe tropical fruits. Without a doubt an example to be followed!

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Que belíssima NE IPA, meus caros!
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: What a beautiful NE IPA, my dears!

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Trabalho com o lúpulo é bem interessante. Carga alta, mas mantendo amargor bem encaixado e limpo. Salada de frutas que me trazem como protagonistas pêssego e laranja. Final prolongado e fácil de beber. Pecou no aroma e no $$. O preço praticado é injusto.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Working with hops is very interesting. High load, but maintaining well-placed and clean bitterness. Fruit salad that features peach and orange as protagonists. Long finish and easy to drink. It missed the aroma and the $$. The price charged is unfair.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Delícia de cerveja, mta fruta amarela. Manga pra caramba.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Delicious beer, lots of yellow fruit. Mango as hell.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Melhor NEIPA nacional já feita, não decepciona nunca!
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Best national NEIPA ever made, never disappoints!

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Um mês depois da primeira lata parece que ficou ainda melhor. Mesma descrição da anterior mas agora apareceu uma nota de abacaxi que me lembra simcoe (mesmo não tendo). Amargor sensacional. Bom corpo. Excelente cerveja. 4.60
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: A month after the first can it seems to have gotten even better. Same description as above but now a pineapple note has appeared that reminds me of simcoe (even though it doesn't). Sensational bitterness. Good body. Excellent beer. 4.60

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Excelente ! Sucão de lúpulo! Acima da média! LCI
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Great ! Hops suck! Above average! LCI

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Palha, turva, com boa formação e retenção. Alcoólica, aroma frutado e cítrico. Sabor remete ao aroma. Corpo médio baixo. Carbonatação média.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Straw, cloudy, with good formation and retention. Alcoholic, fruity and citrus aroma. Flavor refers to aroma. Low medium body. Medium carbonation.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Muita fruta branca, melão, uva verde, kiwi, açúcar refinado, fermento, cp alto, carbonatação alta, seca, no final tem um amargor que remete um pouco a dipirona. Breja ok.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: Lots of white fruit, melon, green grapes, kiwi, refined sugar, yeast, high cp, high carbonation, dry, at the end it has a bitterness that reminds me a little of dipyrone. Breja ok.

/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.comment: Fazia tempo que não bebia. Bem boa. Nessa além de cítrico, capim-limão, há açúcar de confeiteiro, pera e fermento. Macia. Amargor leve, limpo e medianamente duradouro. Mantém o bom padrão Ksb.
/b/koala-san-brew-nuclear-fusion/2570413.translatedComment: I hadn't had a drink in a while. Very good. In addition to citrus, lemongrass, there is powdered sugar, pear and yeast. Soft. Light, clean and medium-lasting bitterness. Maintains good Ksb standard.

/b/spartacus-brewing-art-of-memory/41442.comment: Citrusiness, exotic fruit. It has a playful easy hoppiness, yet full and creamy body, sweet. Still it’s probably not as fresh as it should be, as the can shows a best before date as May 12, 2021.

/b/spartacus-brewing-art-of-memory/41442.comment: Vol fruitig/tropisch .... pspaya, meloen, mango... dat soort fruitigheid... redelijke stevige bitter (gelukkig) en een mooie moutige karamel ziet. Die 10% merk ik niet.... dangerous. Vet bier!

/b/spartacus-brewing-art-of-memory/41442.comment: Frutas tropicais, mamão, melão, algum cítrico, dulçor sutil, álcool escondido, amargor equilibrado.

/b/spartacus-brewing-art-of-memory/41442.comment: Hoppy, juicy, melon, papaya, citrus and mango aroma's. Excellent IPA.

/b/spartacus-brewing-art-of-memory/41442.comment: "Een onvergetelijke mix van Cashmere, Tallus, Simcoe en Loral hop, die zich vertaalt in verschillende lagen van complexiteit zoals meloen, papaja, limoen, pompelmoes, naast een bloemig spectrum." Niets aan toe te voegen. 👌🏼

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Parabéns Dude! Pelo segundo ano consecutivo entregaram o que, para mim, considerei a melhor pastry RIS do ano! Aroma traz o doce de cookies, chocolate ao leite, nuts. Porém no paladar o doce é muito equilibrado, nada enjoada. Perfeição define 👏

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Tomei no chopp antes e agora em lata, nota máxima nas duas. Breja incrivelmente perfeita.

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Loaded profile. Huge character. Cake, pastry. Choc cookie. Almonds, vanilla, coconut, nuts. Impressive. Sweet and dessert. Sticky, syrupy. Sugary. A monster. Luscious. Slow. Slightly heavy. Medium-high bodied, smooth, oily, crispy. Almost chewy. Huge set.
/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: Loaded profile. Huge character. Cake, pastry. Choc cookie. Almonds, vanilla, coconut, nuts. Impressive. Sweet and dessert. Sticky, syrupy. Sugary. A monster. Luscious. Slow. Slightly heavy. Medium-high bodied, smooth, oily, crispy. Almost chewy. Huge set.

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Pra mim, a melhor das 3 que já bebi dessa série. Muita baunilha, avelã, e chocolate. Todos em perfeita harmonia. Muita similaridade com um cookie. Textura perfeita, carbonatação e dulçor. Ainda tem uma pegada de cereja em calda fantástica. 4,80
/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: For me, the best of the 3 I've ever drunk from this series. Lots of vanilla, hazelnut, and chocolate. All in perfect harmony. Very similar to a cookie. Perfect texture, carbonation and sweetness. It still has a fantastic flavor of cherry in syrup. 4.80
Liquid red velvet! Sensational!!

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Super balanced RIS: cocoa, great body, velvety. As it got warmer, picked up some cherry notes, very smooth. lots of strong flavors going on. Its aroma is something else entirely. Pretty red foam. Amazing!
/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: Super balanced RIS: cocoa, great body, velvety. As it got warmer, picked up some cherry notes, very smooth. lots of strong flavors going on. Its aroma is something else entirely. Pretty red foam. Amazing!

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: 25/08/23. Obviamente não tem o mesmo impacto da 1ª vez com uma Red Power, mas pqp, isso aqui é muito foda! Dessa vez avelã em destaque no aroma, seguida do cookie red velvet e chocolate. Cremosa sem ser pesada. Muito equilibrada. A espuma é um espetáculo!
/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: 08/25/23. Obviously it doesn't have the same impact as the first time with a Red Power, but because, this is really cool! This time hazelnut stands out in the aroma, followed by red velvet cookie and chocolate. Creamy without being heavy. Very balanced. The foam is a spectacle!

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Aroma de red velvet. No paladar muito Avelã, biscoito, chocolate, baunilha e frutas vermelhas. Dulcor medio/alto e amargor baixo. Base de corpo leve.
/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: Red velvet scent. On the palate lots of hazelnut, biscuit, chocolate, vanilla and red fruits. Medium/high sweetness and low bitterness. Light body base.

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Levemente inferior ao do festival, mas ainda assim incrível.
/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: Slightly inferior to the festival, but still incredible.

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Obra prima. Não sou um cara bairrista, porém é difícil não sentir um orgulho gigante de ter essa cervejaria aqui no estado. Um red velvet líquido em todos os sentidos. Frutas vermelhas, chocolate e café. Jocemar G. Parabéns. Um deboche de tão boa. Pqp
/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: Masterpiece. I'm not a local guy, but it's hard not to feel incredibly proud to have this brewery here in the state. A liquid red velvet in every way. Red fruits, chocolate and coffee. Jocemar G. Congratulations. Such a good mockery. Pqp

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: Either I would lower the ratings of the previous ones or I would give this one a 5. Because it's another level.

/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.comment: Me desculpem, a cerveja é boa, a aparência é extraordinária, mas me parece que tem muito “buzz about”. Avelã predomina no aroma e sabor, o corpo é leve, no sabor residual sobra apenas avelã. Com certeza há quem discorde, mas essa foi minha percepção.
/b/dude-brewing-red-power-the-creature-r.translatedComment: I'm sorry, the beer is good, the appearance is extraordinary, but it seems to me that there's a lot of “buzz about”. Hazelnut predominates in the aroma and flavor, the body is light, with only hazelnut remaining in the aftertaste. There are certainly those who disagree, but that was my perception.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Checkin de quando ainda usava fraldas
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Checkin when I was still wearing diapers

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Muda de sabor a cada "safra". Tá na hora de mudar de nome, não é?
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: It changes flavor with each "harvest". It's time to change your name, isn't it?

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Como faz para arrumar um patrocínio?
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: How do you get a sponsorship?

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Essa cerveja é uma lenda já!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: This beer is already a legend!

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: A: bomba tropical, abacaxi acima. P: super juicy, com amargor equilibrado e muito frutado. Assustadoramente fácil para 8.3. Excelente. Lote7
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: A: tropical bomb, pineapple above. P: super juicy, with balanced bitterness and very fruity. Scarily easy for 8.3. Great. Lot7

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Gushing que fez metade da lata ir fora. Aromática mas um pouco adstringente. Esperava mais...
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Gushing that made half the can go out. Aromatic but a little astringent. I expected more...

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Simplesmente deliciosa, foda é que fermentou demais!!!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Simply delicious, fuck it fermented too much!!!

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Incrível, saborosa demais... Well done Dogma, again...
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Incredible, too tasty... Well done Dogma, again...

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Ótima Double IPA, aroma cítrico e encorpada no ponto
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Great Double IPA, citrus aroma and full bodied

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Esperava bem mais aroma. Talvez tenha pegado uma lata ruim... Aroma de maracujá. Amargor legal, na medida.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: I expected a lot more aroma. Maybe I got a bad can... Passion fruit aroma. Nice bitterness, just right.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Essa piorou bem! Carbonatação altíssima é um amargor lembrando xarope ruim
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: This one got a lot worse! Very high carbonation is a bitterness reminiscent of bad syrup

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Aroma fresco, frutado, herbal. Mas o que mais impressiona eh o amargor pungente mas equilibrado e limpo, zero de rash
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Fresh, fruity, herbal aroma. But what impresses most is the pungent yet balanced and clean bitterness, zero rash.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Muito bem equilibrada. Sem harsh. Muito sabor. Bastante frutada.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Very well balanced. No harsh. Lots of flavor. Quite fruity.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Não está tão top quanto na época.. lote 1 de 10/16.. Estava aqui guardada e com a lata estufada!! Ainda bem que a minha não estourou!!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: It's not as top as it was at the time.. batch 1 of 10/16.. It was stored here and with the can stuffed!! I'm glad mine didn't burst!!

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Cheirosa e saborosa demais!! Espetaculo de cerva!! Lupulada ate o topo! Show!!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Very fragrant and tasty!! Deer show!! Hopped to the top! Show!!

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Muito carbono! Praticamente não dá para sentir o sabor.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Lots of carbon! You can practically not taste it.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Não quero tietar, mas vou repetir. Os caras não erram. Puta que pariu.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: I don't want to tie the knot, but I'll repeat it. The guys don't make mistakes. Holy shit.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Última da explosiva série! Ficou carbonatada demais, meia hora pra servir o copo, e com um gosto bem ruim!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Last in the explosive series! It was too carbonated, half an hour before serving the glass, and with a very bad taste!

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Espuma persistente. Na geladeira o tempo todo, antes que alguém fale que estava quente.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Persistent foam. In the fridge all the time, before anyone says it was hot.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Aroma inconfundível. ..manga, maracujá,  laranja, uma delícia. Uma das melhores da Dogma. Mas ainda não vale 40 reais a lata. @dogma
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Unmistakable aroma. ..mango, passion fruit, orange, delicious. One of Dogma's best. But it's still not worth 40 reais a can. @dogma

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Bomba de lúpulo! Maracujá, manga, bem frutada. Melao. Bela espuma e corpo.
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Hop bomb! Passion fruit, mango, very fruity. Melon. Beautiful foam and body.

/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.comment: Excelente! Mas a primeira versão ainda é imbatível!
/b/cervejaria-dogma-rizoma-ii/1789613.translatedComment: Great! But the first version is still unbeatable!
